sn22.1:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye.
sn22.1:1.3: Atha kho nakulapitā gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho nakulapitā gahapati bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.1:2.1: “Ahamasmi, bhante, jiṇṇo vuḍḍho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto āturakāyo abhikkhaṇātaṅko.
sn22.1:2.2: Aniccadassāvī kho panāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato manobhāvanīyānañca bhikkhūnaṁ.
sn22.1:3.2: Āturo hāyaṁ, gahapati, kāyo aṇḍabhūto pariyonaddho.
sn22.1:3.3: Yo hi, gahapati, imaṁ kāyaṁ pariharanto muhuttampi ārogyaṁ paṭijāneyya, kimaññatra bālyā?
sn22.1:4.1_0: Atha kho nakulapitā gahapati bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
sn22.1:4.1_1: bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā
sn22.1:4.1_2: āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho nakulapitaraṁ
sn22.1:4.4: Alattha no ajja bhagavato sammukhā dhammiṁ kathaṁ savanāyā”ti?
sn22.1:5.2: Idānāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya amatena abhisitto”ti.
sn22.1:5.3: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, gahapati, bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya amatena abhisitto”ti?
sn22.1:5.4: “Idhāhaṁ, bhante, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁ; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁ. Ekamantaṁ nisinno khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavantaṁ etadavocaṁ:
sn22.1:5.5: ‘ahamasmi, bhante, jiṇṇo vuḍḍho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto āturakāyo abhikkhaṇātaṅko.
sn22.1:5.6: Aniccadassāvī kho panāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato manobhāvanīyānañca bhikkhūnaṁ.
sn22.1:6.1: Evaṁ vutte, maṁ, bhante, bhagavā etadavoca:
sn22.1:6.3: Āturo hāyaṁ, gahapati, kāyo aṇḍabhūto pariyonaddho.
sn22.1:6.4: Yo hi, gahapati, imaṁ kāyaṁ pariharanto muhuttampi ārogyaṁ paṭijāneyya, kimaññatra bālyā?
sn22.1:6.6: āturakāyassa me sato cittaṁ anāturaṁ bhavissatīti.
sn22.1:6.8: Evaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya amatena abhisitto”ti.
sn22.1:7.1: “Na hi pana taṁ, gahapati, paṭibhāsi bhagavantaṁ uttariṁ paṭipucchituṁ:
sn22.1:7.2: ‘kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, āturakāyo ceva hoti āturacitto ca, kittāvatā ca pana āturakāyo hi kho hoti no ca āturacitto’”ti?
sn22.1:7.3: “Dūratopi kho mayaṁ, bhante, āgaccheyyāma āyasmato sāriputtassa santike etassa bhāsitassa atthamaññātuṁ.
sn22.1:7.4: Sādhu vatāyasmantaṁyeva sāriputtaṁ paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho”ti.
sn22.1:8.1: “Tena hi, gahapati, suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn22.1:8.2: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho nakulapitā gahapati āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosi.
sn22.1:9.1: “Kathañca, gahapati, āturakāyo ceva hoti, āturacitto ca?
sn22.1:9.2: Idha, gahapati, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto
sn22.1:9.3: rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.1:9.5: Tassa ‘ahaṁ rūpaṁ, mama rūpan’ti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino taṁ rūpaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:10.1: Vedanaṁ attato samanupassati, vedanāvantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā vedanaṁ, vedanāya vā attānaṁ.
sn22.1:10.3: Tassa ‘ahaṁ vedanā, mama vedanā’ti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, sā vedanā vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:11.1: Saññaṁ attato samanupassati, saññāvantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā saññaṁ, saññāya vā attānaṁ.
sn22.1:11.3: Tassa ‘ahaṁ saññā, mama saññā’ti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, sā saññā vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:12.1: Saṅkhāre attato samanupassati, saṅkhāravantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā saṅkhāre, saṅkhāresu vā attānaṁ.
sn22.1:12.3: Tassa ‘ahaṁ saṅkhārā, mama saṅkhārā’ti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, te saṅkhārā vipariṇamanti aññathā honti.
sn22.1:13.1: Viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.1:13.3: Tassa ‘ahaṁ viññāṇaṁ, mama viññāṇan’ti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, taṁ viññāṇaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:13.5: Evaṁ kho, gahapati, āturakāyo ceva hoti āturacitto ca.
sn22.1:14.1: Kathañca, gahapati, āturakāyo hi kho hoti no ca āturacitto?
sn22.1:14.2: Idha, gahapati, sutavā ariyasāvako ariyānaṁ dassāvī ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto sappurisānaṁ dassāvī sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinīto
sn22.1:14.3: na rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; na attani vā rūpaṁ, na rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.1:14.4: ‘Ahaṁ rūpaṁ, mama rūpan’ti na pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyī hoti.
sn22.1:14.5: Tassa ‘ahaṁ rūpaṁ, mama rūpan’ti apariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, taṁ rūpaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:15.1: Na vedanaṁ attato samanupassati, na vedanāvantaṁ vā attānaṁ; na attani vā vedanaṁ, na vedanāya vā attānaṁ.
sn22.1:15.2: ‘Ahaṁ vedanā, mama vedanā’ti na pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyī hoti.
sn22.1:15.3: Tassa ‘ahaṁ vedanā, mama vedanā’ti apariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, sā vedanā vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:16.1: Na saññaṁ attato samanupassati, na saññāvantaṁ vā attānaṁ; na attani vā saññaṁ, na saññāya vā attānaṁ.
sn22.1:16.2: ‘Ahaṁ saññā, mama saññā’ti na pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyī hoti.
sn22.1:16.3: Tassa ‘ahaṁ saññā, mama saññā’ti apariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, sā saññā vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:17.1: Na saṅkhāre attato samanupassati, na saṅkhāravantaṁ vā attānaṁ; na attani vā saṅkhāre, na saṅkhāresu vā attānaṁ.
sn22.1:17.2: ‘Ahaṁ saṅkhārā, mama saṅkhārā’ti na pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyī hoti.
sn22.1:17.3: Tassa ‘ahaṁ saṅkhārā, mama saṅkhārā’ti apariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, te saṅkhārā vipariṇamanti aññathā honti.
sn22.1:18.1: Na viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, na viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; na attani vā viññāṇaṁ, na viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.1:18.2: ‘Ahaṁ viññāṇaṁ, mama viññāṇan’ti na pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyī hoti.
sn22.1:18.3: Tassa ‘ahaṁ viññāṇaṁ, mama viññāṇan’ti apariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, taṁ viññāṇaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:18.5: Evaṁ kho, gahapati, āturakāyo hoti no ca āturacitto”ti.
sn22.1:19.2: Attamano nakulapitā gahapati āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
sn22.2:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sakkesu viharati devadahaṁ nāma sakyānaṁ nigamo.
sn22.2:1.3_0: Atha kho sambahulā pacchābhūmagamikā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā
sn22.2:1.3_1: bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.2:1.4: “icchāma mayaṁ, bhante, pacchābhūmaṁ janapadaṁ gantuṁ, pacchābhūme janapade nivāsaṁ kappetun”ti.
sn22.2:2.2: “Na kho no, bhante, apalokito āyasmā sāriputto”ti.
sn22.2:2.4: Sāriputto, bhikkhave, paṇḍito, bhikkhūnaṁ anuggāhako sabrahmacārīnan”ti.
sn22.2:2.5: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
sn22.2:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto bhagavato avidūre aññatarasmiṁ eḷagalāgumbe nisinno hoti.
sn22.2:3.2_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ
sn22.2:3.2_1: abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā
sn22.2:3.3: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.2:3.4: “icchāma mayaṁ, āvuso sāriputta, pacchābhūmaṁ janapadaṁ gantuṁ, pacchābhūme janapade nivāsaṁ kappetuṁ.
sn22.2:4.4_0: ‘kiṁvādī panāyasmantānaṁ satthā kimakkhāyī’ti, kacci vo āyasmantānaṁ dhammā sussutā
sn22.2:4.4_1: suggahitā sumanasikatā sūpadhāritā suppaṭividdhā paññāya, yathā byākaramānā āyasmanto
sn22.2:4.4_2: vuttavādino ceva bhagavato assatha, na ca bhagavantaṁ abhūtena abbhācikkheyyātha,
sn22.2:4.4_3: dhammassa cānudhammaṁ byākareyyātha, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṁ
sn22.2:5.1: “Dūratopi kho mayaṁ, āvuso, āgaccheyyāma āyasmato sāriputtassa santike etassa bhāsitassa atthamaññātuṁ.
sn22.2:5.2: Sādhu vatāyasmantaṁyeva sāriputtaṁ paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho”ti.
sn22.2:5.3: “Tena hāvuso, suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn22.2:5.4: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
sn22.2:6.5: Evaṁ puṭṭhā tumhe, āvuso, evaṁ byākareyyātha:
sn22.2:7.1: Evaṁ byākatepi kho, āvuso, assuyeva uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchitāro—
sn22.2:7.5: Evaṁ puṭṭhā tumhe, āvuso, evaṁ byākareyyātha:
sn22.2:8.1: Evaṁ byākatepi kho, āvuso, assuyeva uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchitāro—
sn22.2:8.4: ‘kiṁ panāyasmantānaṁ ādīnavaṁ disvā rūpe chandarāgavinayakkhāyī satthā,
sn22.2:8.9: Evaṁ puṭṭhā tumhe, āvuso, evaṁ byākareyyātha:
sn22.2:8.10_0: ‘rūpe kho, āvuso, avigatarāgassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipāsassa
sn22.2:8.10_1: avigatapariḷāhassa avigatataṇhassa tassa rūpassa vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjanti
sn22.2:8.14: avigatataṇhassa tesaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā.
sn22.2:8.15_0: Viññāṇe avigatarāgassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipāsassa avigatapariḷāhassa
sn22.2:8.15_1: avigatataṇhassa tassa viññāṇassa vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā.
sn22.2:8.16: Idaṁ kho no, āvuso, ādīnavaṁ disvā rūpe chandarāgavinayakkhāyī satthā,
sn22.2:9.1: Evaṁ byākatepi kho, āvuso, assuyeva uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchitāro—
sn22.2:9.4: ‘kiṁ panāyasmantānaṁ ānisaṁsaṁ disvā rūpe chandarāgavinayakkhāyī satthā,
sn22.2:9.9: Evaṁ puṭṭhā tumhe, āvuso, evaṁ byākareyyātha:
sn22.2:9.10_0: ‘rūpe kho, āvuso, vigatarāgassa vigatacchandassa vigatapemassa vigatapipāsassa vigatapariḷāhassa
sn22.2:9.10_1: vigatataṇhassa tassa rūpassa vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā nuppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā.
sn22.2:9.13_0: saṅkhāresu vigatarāgassa vigatacchandassa vigatapemassa vigatapipāsassa vigatapariḷāhassa
sn22.2:9.13_1: vigatataṇhassa tesaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā nuppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā.
sn22.2:9.14_0: Viññāṇe vigatarāgassa vigatacchandassa vigatapemassa vigatapipāsassa vigatapariḷāhassa
sn22.2:9.14_1: vigatataṇhassa tassa viññāṇassa vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā nuppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā.
sn22.2:9.15: Idaṁ kho no, āvuso, ānisaṁsaṁ disvā rūpe chandarāgavinayakkhāyī satthā, vedanāya …
sn22.2:10.1_0: Akusale cāvuso, dhamme upasampajja viharato diṭṭhe ceva dhamme sukho vihāro abhavissa
sn22.2:10.1_1: avighāto anupāyāso apariḷāho, kāyassa ca bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā, nayidaṁ
sn22.2:10.2_0: Yasmā ca kho, āvuso, akusale dhamme upasampajja viharato diṭṭhe ceva dhamme dukkho
sn22.2:10.2_1: vihāro savighāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho, kāyassa ca bhedā paraṁ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā,
sn22.2:10.2_2: tasmā bhagavā akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānaṁ vaṇṇeti.
sn22.2:11.1_0: Kusale cāvuso, dhamme upasampajja viharato diṭṭhe ceva dhamme dukkho vihāro abhavissa
sn22.2:11.1_1: savighāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho, kāyassa ca bhedā paraṁ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā,
sn22.2:11.1_2: nayidaṁ bhagavā kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upasampadaṁ vaṇṇeyya.
sn22.2:11.2_0: Yasmā ca kho, āvuso, kusale dhamme upasampajja viharato diṭṭhe ceva dhamme sukho
sn22.2:11.2_1: vihāro avighāto anupāyāso apariḷāho, kāyassa ca bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā,
sn22.2:11.2_2: tasmā bhagavā kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upasampadaṁ vaṇṇetī”ti.
sn22.2:12.2: Attamanā te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
sn22.3:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā mahākaccāno avantīsu viharati kuraraghare papāte pabbate.
sn22.3:1.3_0: Atha kho hāliddikāni gahapati yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā
sn22.3:1.3_1: āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho hāliddikāni
sn22.3:3.1: Imassa nu kho, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa kathaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti?
sn22.3:5.2_0: Rūpadhātuyā kho, gahapati, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso
sn22.3:5.2_1: adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā te tathāgatassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā
sn22.3:5.7_0: viññāṇadhātuyā kho, gahapati, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā
sn22.3:5.7_1: cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā te tathāgatassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā
sn22.3:7.2: Rūpanimittaniketavisāravinibandhā kho, gahapati, tathāgatassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn22.3:7.8: dhammanimittaniketavisāravinibandhā kho, gahapati, tathāgatassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn22.3:8.2: Idha, gahapati, ekacco gihīhi saṁsaṭṭho viharati sahanandī sahasokī, sukhitesu sukhito, dukkhitesu dukkhito, uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu attanā tesu yogaṁ āpajjati.
sn22.3:8.3: Evaṁ kho, gahapati, gāme santhavajāto hoti.
sn22.3:9.1: Kathañca, gahapati, gāme na santhavajāto hoti?
sn22.3:9.2: Idha, gahapati, bhikkhu gihīhi asaṁsaṭṭho viharati na sahanandī na sahasokī na sukhitesu sukhito na dukkhitesu dukkhito, uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu na attanā tesu yogaṁ āpajjati.
sn22.3:9.3: Evaṁ kho, gahapati, gāme na santhavajāto hoti.
sn22.3:10.2: Idha, gahapati, ekacco kāmesu avigatarāgo hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipāso avigatapariḷāho avigatataṇho.
sn22.3:10.3: Evaṁ kho, gahapati, kāmehi aritto hoti.
sn22.3:11.2: Idha, gahapati, ekacco kāmesu vigatarāgo hoti vigatacchando vigatapemo vigatapipāso vigatapariḷāho vigatataṇho.
sn22.3:11.3: Evaṁ kho, gahapati, kāmehi ritto hoti.
sn22.3:12.3: ‘evaṁrūpo siyaṁ anāgatamaddhānaṁ, evaṁvedano siyaṁ anāgatamaddhānaṁ, evaṁsañño siyaṁ anāgatamaddhānaṁ, evaṁsaṅkhāro siyaṁ anāgatamaddhānaṁ, evaṁviññāṇo siyaṁ anāgatamaddhānan’ti.
sn22.3:13.2: Idha, gahapati, ekaccassa na evaṁ hoti:
sn22.3:13.3: ‘evaṁrūpo siyaṁ anāgatamaddhānaṁ, evaṁvedano siyaṁ anāgatamaddhānaṁ, evaṁsañño siyaṁ anāgatamaddhānaṁ, evaṁsaṅkhāro siyaṁ anāgatamaddhānaṁ, evaṁviññāṇo siyaṁ anāgatamaddhānan’ti.
sn22.3:14.1: Kathañca, gahapati, kathaṁ viggayha janena kattā hoti?
sn22.3:14.2: Idha, gahapati, ekacco evarūpiṁ kathaṁ kattā hoti:
sn22.3:14.3_0: ‘na tvaṁ imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ ājānāsi; ahaṁ imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ ājānāmi. Kiṁ tvaṁ imaṁ
sn22.3:14.3_1: dhammavinayaṁ ājānissasi? Micchāpaṭipanno tvamasi; ahamasmi sammāpaṭipanno. Pure
sn22.3:14.3_2: vacanīyaṁ pacchā avaca; pacchā vacanīyaṁ pure avaca. Sahitaṁ me, asahitaṁ te. Adhiciṇṇaṁ
sn22.3:14.3_3: te viparāvattaṁ. Āropito te vādo; cara vādappamokkhāya. Niggahitosi; nibbeṭhehi vā sace pahosī’ti.
sn22.3:14.4: Evaṁ kho, gahapati, kathaṁ viggayha janena kattā hoti.
sn22.3:15.1: Kathañca, gahapati, kathaṁ na viggayha janena kattā hoti?
sn22.3:15.2: Idha, gahapati, bhikkhu na evarūpiṁ kathaṁ kattā hoti:
sn22.3:15.3: ‘na tvaṁ imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ ājānāsi …pe… nibbeṭhehi vā sace pahosī’ti.
sn22.3:15.4: Evaṁ kho, gahapati, kathaṁ na viggayha janena kattā hoti.
sn22.3:16.1: Iti kho, gahapati, yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā aṭṭhakavaggiye māgaṇḍiyapañhe:
sn22.3:18.1: Imassa kho, gahapati, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
sn22.4:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā mahākaccāno avantīsu viharati kuraraghare papāte pabbate.
sn22.4:1.3: Atha kho hāliddikāni gahapati yenāyasmā mahākaccāno …pe… ekamantaṁ nisinno kho hāliddikāni gahapati āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.4:1.5: ‘ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttā, te accantaniṭṭhā accantayogakkhemino accantabrahmacārino accantapariyosānā seṭṭhā devamanussānan’ti.
sn22.4:2.1: Imassa nu kho, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa kathaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti?
sn22.4:3.1_0: “Rūpadhātuyā kho, gahapati, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso
sn22.4:3.1_1: adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā, tesaṁ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā ‘cittaṁ suvimuttanti’ vuccati.
sn22.4:4.4_0: viññāṇadhātuyā kho, gahapati, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā
sn22.4:4.4_1: cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā, tesaṁ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā ‘cittaṁ
sn22.4:5.1: Iti kho, gahapati, yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā sakkapañhe:
sn22.4:5.2: ‘ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttā te accantaniṭṭhā accantayogakkhemino accantabrahmacārino accantapariyosānā seṭṭhā devamanussānan’ti.
sn22.4:6.1: Imassa kho, gahapati, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
sn22.5:1.7_0: Rūpassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca, vedanāya samudayañca atthaṅgamañca, saññāya samudayañca
sn22.5:1.7_1: atthaṅgamañca, saṅkhārānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca, viññāṇassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca.
sn22.5:2.1: Ko ca, bhikkhave, rūpassa samudayo, ko vedanāya samudayo, ko saññāya samudayo, ko saṅkhārānaṁ samudayo, ko viññāṇassa samudayo?
sn22.5:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn22.5:3.3: Tassa rūpaṁ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
sn22.5:4.5: Tassa viññāṇaṁ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
sn22.5:6.1: Ko ca, bhikkhave, rūpassa atthaṅgamo, ko vedanāya …
sn22.5:7.1: Idha, bhikkhave, nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn22.5:8.3: Tassa rūpaṁ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato yā rūpe nandī sā nirujjhati.
sn22.5:9.2: Tassa vedanaṁ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato yā vedanāya nandī sā nirujjhati.
sn22.5:10.3: Tassa saṅkhāre anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato yā saṅkhāresu nandī sā nirujjhati.
sn22.5:11.2: Tassa viññāṇaṁ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato yā viññāṇe nandī sā nirujjhati.
sn22.5:12.1: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, rūpassa atthaṅgamo, ayaṁ vedanāya atthaṅgamo, ayaṁ saññāya atthaṅgamo, ayaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ atthaṅgamo, ayaṁ viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo”ti.
sn22.6:1.5_0: Rūpassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca, vedanāya samudayañca atthaṅgamañca, saññāya samudayañca
sn22.6:1.5_1: atthaṅgamañca, saṅkhārānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca, viññāṇassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca …pe…
sn22.7:1.3: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn22.7:1.4: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti, kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
sn22.7:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto
sn22.7:2.3: rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.7:2.4: Tassa taṁ rūpaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.7:2.6: Tassa rūpavipariṇāmānuparivattijā paritassanā dhammasamuppādā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti.
sn22.7:2.7: Cetaso pariyādānā uttāsavā ca hoti vighātavā ca apekkhavā ca upādāya ca paritassati.
sn22.7:3.1: Vedanaṁ attato samanupassati, vedanāvantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā vedanaṁ, vedanāya vā attānaṁ.
sn22.7:3.2: Tassa sā vedanā vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.7:3.4: Tassa vedanāvipariṇāmānuparivattijā paritassanā dhammasamuppādā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti.
sn22.7:3.5: Cetaso pariyādānā uttāsavā ca hoti vighātavā ca apekkhavā ca upādāya ca paritassati.
sn22.7:4.2: saṅkhāre attato samanupassati, saṅkhāravantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā saṅkhāre, saṅkhāresu vā attānaṁ.
sn22.7:4.3: Tassa te saṅkhārā vipariṇamanti aññathā honti.
sn22.7:4.5: Tassa saṅkhāravipariṇāmānuparivattijā paritassanā dhammasamuppādā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti.
sn22.7:4.6: Cetaso pariyādānā uttāsavā ca hoti vighātavā ca apekkhavā ca upādāya ca paritassati.
sn22.7:5.1: Viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.7:5.2: Tassa taṁ viññāṇaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.7:5.4: Tassa viññāṇavipariṇāmānuparivattijā paritassanā dhammasamuppādā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti.
sn22.7:5.5: Cetaso pariyādānā uttāsavā ca hoti vighātavā ca apekkhavā ca upādāya ca paritassati.
sn22.7:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako ariyānaṁ dassāvī ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto, sappurisānaṁ dassāvī sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinīto
sn22.7:6.3: na rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; na attani vā rūpaṁ, na rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.7:6.4: Tassa taṁ rūpaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.7:6.5: Tassa rūpavipariṇāmaññathābhāvā na rūpavipariṇāmānuparivatti viññāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.7:6.6: Tassa na rūpavipariṇāmānuparivattijā paritassanā dhammasamuppādā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti.
sn22.7:6.7: Cetaso apariyādānā na cevuttāsavā hoti na ca vighātavā na ca apekkhavā, anupādāya ca na paritassati.
sn22.7:7.1: Na vedanaṁ attato samanupassati, na vedanāvantaṁ vā attānaṁ; na attani vā vedanaṁ, na vedanāya vā attānaṁ.
sn22.7:7.2: Tassa sā vedanā vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.7:7.3: Tassa vedanāvipariṇāmaññathābhāvā na vedanāvipariṇāmānuparivatti viññāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.7:7.4: Tassa na vedanāvipariṇāmānuparivattijā paritassanā dhammasamuppādā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti.
sn22.7:7.5: Cetaso apariyādānā na cevuttāsavā hoti na ca vighātavā na ca apekkhavā, anupādāya ca na paritassati.
sn22.7:8.1: Na saññaṁ …pe… na saṅkhāre attato samanupassati,
sn22.7:8.2: na attani vā saṅkhāre, na saṅkhāresu vā attānaṁ.
sn22.7:8.4: Tassa te saṅkhārā vipariṇamanti aññathā honti.
sn22.7:8.5: Tassa saṅkhāravipariṇāmaññathābhāvā na saṅkhāravipariṇāmānuparivatti viññāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.7:8.6: Tassa na saṅkhāravipariṇāmānuparivattijā paritassanā dhammasamuppādā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti.
sn22.7:8.7: Cetaso apariyādānā na cevuttāsavā hoti na ca vighātavā na ca apekkhavā, anupādāya ca na paritassati.
sn22.7:9.1: Na viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, na viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ …pe…
sn22.7:9.2: tassa taṁ viññāṇaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.7:9.3: Tassa viññāṇavipariṇāmaññathābhāvā na viññāṇavipariṇāmānuparivatti viññāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.7:9.4: Tassa na viññāṇavipariṇāmānuparivattijā paritassanā dhammasamuppādā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti.
sn22.7:9.5: Cetaso apariyādānā na cevuttāsavā hoti na ca vighātavā na ca apekkhavā, anupādāya ca na paritassati.
sn22.7:9.6: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, anupādā aparitassanaṁ hotī”ti.
sn22.8:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano rūpaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati.
sn22.8:1.6: Tassa taṁ rūpaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.8:1.11: viññāṇaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati.
sn22.8:1.12: Tassa taṁ viññāṇaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.8:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
sn22.8:2.3: Tassa taṁ rūpaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.8:2.8: viññāṇaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
sn22.8:2.9: Tassa taṁ viññāṇaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.9:1.4: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītasmiṁ rūpasmiṁ anapekkho hoti;
sn22.9:1.6: paccuppannassa rūpassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn22.9:1.11: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītesu saṅkhāresu anapekkho hoti;
sn22.9:1.13: paccuppannānaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn22.9:1.16: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītasmiṁ viññāṇasmiṁ anapekkho hoti;
sn22.9:1.18: paccuppannassa viññāṇassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hotī”ti.
sn22.10:1.4: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītasmiṁ rūpasmiṁ anapekkho hoti;
sn22.10:1.6: paccuppannassa rūpassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn22.10:1.12: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītasmiṁ viññāṇasmiṁ anapekkho hoti;
sn22.10:1.14: paccuppannassa viññāṇassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hotī”ti.
sn22.11:1.4: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītasmiṁ rūpasmiṁ anapekkho hoti;
sn22.11:1.6: paccuppannassa rūpassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn22.11:1.12: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītasmiṁ viññāṇasmiṁ anapekkho hoti;
sn22.11:1.14: paccuppannassa viññāṇassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hotī”ti.
sn22.12:1.4: “rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, aniccaṁ, vedanā aniccā, saññā aniccā, saṅkhārā aniccā, viññāṇaṁ aniccaṁ.
sn22.12:1.5: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi nibbindati, saññāyapi nibbindati, saṅkhāresupi nibbindati, viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati.
sn22.12:1.6: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.12:1.7: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn22.13:1.2: “Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ, vedanā dukkhā, saññā dukkhā, saṅkhārā dukkhā, viññāṇaṁ dukkhaṁ.
sn22.14:1.2: “Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, anattā, vedanā anattā, saññā anattā, saṅkhārā anattā, viññāṇaṁ anattā.
sn22.14:1.3: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi nibbindati, saññāyapi nibbindati, saṅkhāresupi nibbindati, viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati.
sn22.14:1.4: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.14:1.5: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn22.15:1.5: yadanattā taṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.15:1.9: yadanattā taṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.15:1.15: yadanattā taṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.16:1.4: yadanattā taṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.16:1.10: yadanattā taṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.17:1.3: Yadanattā taṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.17:1.8: Yadanattā taṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.18:1.3: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo rūpassa uppādāya, sopi anicco.
sn22.18:1.4: Aniccasambhūtaṁ, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ kuto niccaṁ bhavissati.
sn22.18:1.6: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo vedanāya uppādāya, sopi anicco.
sn22.18:1.7: Aniccasambhūtā, bhikkhave, vedanā kuto niccā bhavissati.
sn22.18:1.10: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo saṅkhārānaṁ uppādāya, sopi anicco.
sn22.18:1.11: Aniccasambhūtā, bhikkhave, saṅkhārā kuto niccā bhavissanti.
sn22.18:1.13: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo viññāṇassa uppādāya, sopi anicco.
sn22.18:1.14: Aniccasambhūtaṁ, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṁ kuto niccaṁ bhavissati.
sn22.19:1.3: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo rūpassa uppādāya, sopi dukkho.
sn22.19:1.4: Dukkhasambhūtaṁ, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ kuto sukhaṁ bhavissati.
sn22.19:1.9: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo viññāṇassa uppādāya, sopi dukkho.
sn22.19:1.10: Dukkhasambhūtaṁ, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṁ kuto sukhaṁ bhavissati.
sn22.20:1.3: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo rūpassa uppādāya, sopi anattā.
sn22.20:1.4: Anattasambhūtaṁ, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ kuto attā bhavissati.
sn22.20:1.9: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo viññāṇassa uppādāya, sopi anattā.
sn22.20:1.10: Anattasambhūtaṁ, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṁ kuto attā bhavissati.
sn22.21:1.2: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.21:1.4: Katamesānaṁ kho, bhante, dhammānaṁ nirodho ‘nirodho’ti vuccatī”ti?
sn22.21:1.5: “Rūpaṁ kho, ānanda, aniccaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ khayadhammaṁ vayadhammaṁ virāgadhammaṁ nirodhadhammaṁ.
sn22.21:1.7: Vedanā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā.
sn22.21:1.10: saṅkhārā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā.
sn22.21:1.12: Viññāṇaṁ aniccaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ khayadhammaṁ vayadhammaṁ virāgadhammaṁ nirodhadhammaṁ.
sn22.21:1.14: Imesaṁ kho, ānanda, dhammānaṁ nirodho ‘nirodho’ti vuccatī”ti.
sn22.22:1.2: “bhārañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi bhārahārañca bhārādānañca bhāranikkhepanañca.
sn22.22:3.2: Yāyaṁ taṇhā ponobhavikā nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.22:4.2: Yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo.
sn22.22:5.2: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
sn22.23:1.5: Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, pariññeyyo dhammo, vedanā pariññeyyo dhammo, saññā pariññeyyo dhammo, saṅkhārā pariññeyyo dhammo, viññāṇaṁ pariññeyyo dhammo.
sn22.24:1.2: “Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṁ aparijānaṁ avirājayaṁ appajahaṁ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya;
sn22.24:1.3: vedanaṁ anabhijānaṁ aparijānaṁ avirājayaṁ appajahaṁ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya;
sn22.24:1.5: saṅkhāre anabhijānaṁ aparijānaṁ avirājayaṁ appajahaṁ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya;
sn22.24:1.6: viññāṇaṁ anabhijānaṁ aparijānaṁ avirājayaṁ appajahaṁ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn22.24:1.7: Rūpañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṁ parijānaṁ virājayaṁ pajahaṁ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāya;
sn22.24:1.11: viññāṇaṁ abhijānaṁ parijānaṁ virājayaṁ pajahaṁ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā”ti.
sn22.25:1.3: Evaṁ taṁ rūpaṁ pahīnaṁ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammaṁ.
sn22.25:1.5: Evaṁ sā vedanā pahīnā bhavissati ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn22.25:1.7: Evaṁ sā saññā pahīnā bhavissati ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn22.25:1.9: Evaṁ te saṅkhārā pahīnā bhavissanti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn22.25:1.11: Evaṁ taṁ viññāṇaṁ pahīnaṁ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhamman”ti.
sn22.26:1.2: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
sn22.26:1.3: ‘ko nu kho rūpassa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ?
sn22.26:1.4: Ko vedanāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ?
sn22.26:1.5: Ko saññāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ?
sn22.26:1.6: Ko saṅkhārānaṁ assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ?
sn22.26:1.7: Ko viññāṇassa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇan’ti?
sn22.26:1.9: ‘yaṁ kho rūpaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ rūpassa assādo.
sn22.26:1.10: Yaṁ rūpaṁ aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, ayaṁ rūpassa ādīnavo.
sn22.26:1.11: Yo rūpasmiṁ chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ, idaṁ rūpassa nissaraṇaṁ.
sn22.26:1.12: Yaṁ vedanaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ vedanāya assādo.
sn22.26:1.13: Yaṁ vedanā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṁ vedanāya ādīnavo.
sn22.26:1.14: Yo vedanāya chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ, idaṁ vedanāya nissaraṇaṁ.
sn22.26:1.16: yaṁ saṅkhāre paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ assādo.
sn22.26:1.17: Yaṁ saṅkhārā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ ādīnavo.
sn22.26:1.18: Yo saṅkhāresu chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ, idaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ nissaraṇaṁ.
sn22.26:1.19: Yaṁ viññāṇaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ viññāṇassa assādo.
sn22.26:1.20: Yaṁ viññāṇaṁ aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, ayaṁ viññāṇassa ādīnavo.
sn22.26:1.21: Yo viññāṇasmiṁ chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ, idaṁ viññāṇassa nissaraṇaṁ’.
sn22.26:2.1_0: Yāvakīvañcāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ evaṁ assādañca assādato
sn22.26:2.1_1: ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ nābbhaññāsiṁ, neva tāvāhaṁ,
sn22.26:2.1_2: bhikkhave, ‘sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya
sn22.26:2.2: Yato ca khvāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ evaṁ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ;
sn22.26:2.3: athāhaṁ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhoti paccaññāsiṁ.
sn22.26:2.5: ‘akuppā me vimutti; ayamantimā jāti; natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
sn22.27:1.4: Yāvatā rūpassa assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn22.27:1.7: Yāvatā rūpassa ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn22.27:1.10: Yāvatā rūpassa nissaraṇaṁ paññāya me taṁ sudiṭṭhaṁ.
sn22.27:1.16: Yāvatā viññāṇassa assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn22.27:1.19: Yāvatā viññāṇassa ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn22.27:1.22: Yāvatā viññāṇassa nissaraṇaṁ paññāya me taṁ sudiṭṭhaṁ.
sn22.27:1.23: Yāvakīvañcāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ nābbhaññāsiṁ …pe…
sn22.27:1.26: ‘akuppā me vimutti; ayamantimā jāti; natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
sn22.28:1.2: “No cedaṁ, bhikkhave, rūpassa assādo abhavissa nayidaṁ sattā rūpasmiṁ sārajjeyyuṁ.
sn22.28:1.3: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi rūpassa assādo, tasmā sattā rūpasmiṁ sārajjanti.
sn22.28:1.4: No cedaṁ, bhikkhave, rūpassa ādīnavo abhavissa nayidaṁ sattā rūpasmiṁ nibbindeyyuṁ.
sn22.28:1.5: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi rūpassa ādīnavo, tasmā sattā rūpasmiṁ nibbindanti.
sn22.28:1.6: No cedaṁ, bhikkhave, rūpassa nissaraṇaṁ abhavissa nayidaṁ sattā rūpasmā nissareyyuṁ.
sn22.28:1.7: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi rūpassa nissaraṇaṁ, tasmā sattā rūpasmā nissaranti.
sn22.28:1.10: no cedaṁ, bhikkhave, saṅkhārānaṁ nissaraṇaṁ abhavissa, nayidaṁ sattā saṅkhārehi nissareyyuṁ.
sn22.28:1.11: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi saṅkhārānaṁ nissaraṇaṁ, tasmā sattā saṅkhārehi nissaranti.
sn22.28:1.12: No cedaṁ, bhikkhave, viññāṇassa assādo abhavissa, nayidaṁ sattā viññāṇasmiṁ sārajjeyyuṁ.
sn22.28:1.13: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi viññāṇassa assādo, tasmā sattā viññāṇasmiṁ sārajjanti.
sn22.28:1.14: No cedaṁ, bhikkhave, viññāṇassa ādīnavo abhavissa, nayidaṁ sattā viññāṇasmiṁ nibbindeyyuṁ.
sn22.28:1.15: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi viññāṇassa ādīnavo, tasmā sattā viññāṇasmiṁ nibbindanti.
sn22.28:1.16: No cedaṁ, bhikkhave, viññāṇassa nissaraṇaṁ abhavissa, nayidaṁ sattā viññāṇasmā nissareyyuṁ.
sn22.28:1.17: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi viññāṇassa nissaraṇaṁ, tasmā sattā viññāṇasmā nissaranti.
sn22.28:2.1: Yāvakīvañca, bhikkhave, sattā imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ nābbhaññaṁsu;
sn22.28:2.2: neva tāva, bhikkhave, sattā sadevakā lokā samārakā sabrahmakā sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya nissaṭā visaṁyuttā vippamuttā vimariyādīkatena cetasā vihariṁsu.
sn22.28:2.3: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, sattā imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññaṁsu;
sn22.28:2.4: atha, bhikkhave, sattā sadevakā lokā samārakā sabrahmakā sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya nissaṭā visaṁyuttā vippamuttā vimariyādīkatena cetasā viharanti”.
sn22.29:1.2: “Yo, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ abhinandati, dukkhaṁ so abhinandati.
sn22.29:1.3: Yo dukkhaṁ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn22.29:1.7: yo viññāṇaṁ abhinandati, dukkhaṁ so abhinandati.
sn22.29:1.8: Yo dukkhaṁ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn22.29:1.9: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ nābhinandati, dukkhaṁ so nābhinandati.
sn22.29:1.10: Yo dukkhaṁ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn22.29:1.14: yo viññāṇaṁ nābhinandati, dukkhaṁ so nābhinandati.
sn22.29:1.15: Yo dukkhaṁ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmī”ti.
sn22.30:1.2: “Yo, bhikkhave, rūpassa uppādo ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāvo, dukkhasseso uppādo rogānaṁ ṭhiti jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvo.
sn22.30:1.6: yo viññāṇassa uppādo ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāvo, dukkhasseso uppādo rogānaṁ ṭhiti jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvo.
sn22.30:1.7: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpassa nirodho vūpasamo atthaṅgamo, dukkhasseso nirodho rogānaṁ vūpasamo jarāmaraṇassa atthaṅgamo.
sn22.30:1.11: yo viññāṇassa nirodho vūpasamo atthaṅgamo, dukkhasseso nirodho rogānaṁ vūpasamo jarāmaraṇassa atthaṅgamo”ti.
sn22.31:1.5: Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, aghaṁ, vedanā aghaṁ, saññā aghaṁ, saṅkhārā aghaṁ, viññāṇaṁ aghaṁ.
sn22.32:1.6: Yo tassa nirodho vūpasamo atthaṅgamo, idaṁ appabhaṅgu.
sn22.32:1.8: Yo tassā nirodho vūpasamo atthaṅgamo, idaṁ appabhaṅgu.
sn22.32:1.11: Yo tesaṁ nirodho vūpasamo atthaṅgamo, idaṁ appabhaṅgu.
sn22.32:1.13: Yo tassa nirodho vūpasamo atthaṅgamo, idaṁ appabhaṅgū”ti.
sn22.33:1.3: Taṁ vo pahīnaṁ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.33:1.5: Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṁ, taṁ pajahatha.
sn22.33:1.6: Taṁ vo pahīnaṁ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.33:1.8: Sā vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.33:1.11: Te vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissanti.
sn22.33:1.13: Taṁ vo pahīnaṁ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.33:2.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yaṁ imasmiṁ jetavane tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṁ taṁ jano hareyya vā ḍaheyya vā yathāpaccayaṁ vā kareyya.
sn22.33:2.3: ‘amhe jano harati vā ḍahati vā yathāpaccayaṁ vā karotī’”ti?
sn22.33:2.6: “Na hi no etaṁ, bhante, attā vā attaniyaṁ vā”ti.
sn22.33:2.7: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ na tumhākaṁ, taṁ pajahatha.
sn22.33:2.8: Taṁ vo pahīnaṁ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.33:2.10: Sā vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.33:2.14: Taṁ vo pahīnaṁ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti.
sn22.34:1.3: Taṁ vo pahīnaṁ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.34:1.5: Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṁ, taṁ pajahatha.
sn22.34:1.6: Taṁ vo pahīnaṁ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.34:1.11: Taṁ vo pahīnaṁ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.34:1.12: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṁ taṁ pajahatha.
sn22.34:1.13: Taṁ vo pahīnaṁ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti.
sn22.35:1.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.35:1.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṁ desetu;
sn22.35:1.4: yamahaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho, appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.35:1.5: “Yaṁ kho, bhikkhu, anuseti, tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati;
sn22.35:1.6: yaṁ nānuseti, na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchatī”ti.
sn22.35:2.1: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsī”ti?
sn22.35:2.5: Saṅkhāre ce anuseti tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.35:2.7: Rūpañce, bhante, nānuseti na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.35:2.11: viññāṇañce nānuseti na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.35:2.12: Imassa khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmī”ti.
sn22.35:3.2: Sādhu kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsi.
sn22.35:3.3: Rūpañce, bhikkhu, anuseti tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.35:3.8: Rūpañce, bhikkhu, nānuseti na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.35:3.12: viññāṇañce nānuseti na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.35:3.13: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena, bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
sn22.35:4.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
sn22.35:5.1_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya
sn22.35:5.1_1: kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ
sn22.35:5.1_2: diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
sn22.35:5.2: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn22.35:5.3: Aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṁ ahosīti.
sn22.36:1.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā …pe… ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.36:1.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṁ desetu yamahaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.36:1.7: yaṁ nānumīyati na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchatī”ti.
sn22.36:2.1: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsī”ti?
sn22.36:2.9: Rūpañce, bhante, nānuseti na taṁ anumīyati;
sn22.36:2.10: yaṁ nānumīyati na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.36:2.15: yaṁ nānumīyati na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.36:2.16: Imassa khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmī”ti.
sn22.36:3.2: Sādhu kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsi.
sn22.36:3.10: Rūpañce, bhikkhu, nānuseti na taṁ anumīyati;
sn22.36:3.11: yaṁ nānumīyati na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.36:3.16: yaṁ nānumīyati na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.36:3.17: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti …pe…
sn22.36:3.18: aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṁ ahosīti.
sn22.37:1.3: ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn22.37:2.2: ‘katamesaṁ, āvuso ānanda, dhammānaṁ uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyatī’ti?
sn22.37:2.3: Evaṁ puṭṭho tvaṁ, ānanda, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn22.37:2.5: ‘katamesaṁ, āvuso ānanda, dhammānaṁ uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyatī’ti?
sn22.37:2.7: ‘rūpassa kho, āvuso, uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyati.
sn22.37:2.11: viññāṇassa uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyati.
sn22.37:2.12: Imesaṁ kho, āvuso, dhammānaṁ uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyatī’ti.
sn22.37:3.2: Rūpassa kho, ānanda, uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyati.
sn22.37:3.6: viññāṇassa uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyati.
sn22.37:3.7: Imesaṁ kho, ānanda, dhammānaṁ uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyatīti.
sn22.37:3.8: Evaṁ puṭṭho tvaṁ, ānanda, evaṁ byākareyyāsī”ti.
sn22.38:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn22.38:2.2: ‘katamesaṁ, āvuso ānanda, dhammānaṁ uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyittha?
sn22.38:2.3: Katamesaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyissati?
sn22.38:2.4: Katamesaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyatī’ti?
sn22.38:2.5: Evaṁ puṭṭho tvaṁ, ānanda, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn22.38:2.7: ‘katamesaṁ, āvuso ānanda, dhammānaṁ uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyittha?

sn22.38:2.14: tassā uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitāya aññathattaṁ paññāyittha.
