sn22.39:1.3: yaṁ rūpe nibbidābahulo vihareyya, vedanāya nibbidābahulo vihareyya, saññāya nibbidābahulo vihareyya, saṅkhāresu nibbidābahulo vihareyya, viññāṇe nibbidābahulo vihareyya.
sn22.39:1.4_0: Yo rūpe nibbidābahulo viharanto, vedanāya … saññāya … saṅkhāresu nibbidābahulo viharanto,
sn22.39:1.4_1: viññāṇe nibbidābahulo viharanto rūpaṁ parijānāti, vedanaṁ … saññaṁ … saṅkhāre … viññāṇaṁ parijānāti,
sn22.39:1.5_0: so rūpaṁ parijānaṁ, vedanaṁ … saññaṁ … saṅkhāre … viññāṇaṁ parijānaṁ parimuccati
sn22.39:1.5_1: rūpamhā, parimuccati vedanāya, parimuccati saññāya, parimuccati saṅkhārehi, parimuccati viññāṇamhā,
sn22.39:1.6: parimuccati jātiyā jarāmaraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, parimuccati dukkhasmāti vadāmī”ti.
sn22.40:1.2: “Dhammānudhammappaṭipannassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ayamanudhammo hoti yaṁ rūpe aniccānupassī vihareyya …pe…
sn22.41:1.2: “Dhammānudhammappaṭipannassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ayamanudhammo hoti yaṁ rūpe dukkhānupassī vihareyya …pe…
sn22.42:1.2: “Dhammānudhammappaṭipannassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ayamanudhammo hoti yaṁ rūpe anattānupassī vihareyya, vedanāya … saññāya … saṅkhāresu … viññāṇe anattānupassī vihareyya.
sn22.42:1.3_0: Yo rūpe anattānupassī viharanto …pe… rūpaṁ parijānāti, vedanaṁ … saññaṁ … saṅkhāre
sn22.42:1.3_1: … viññāṇaṁ parijānāti, so rūpaṁ parijānaṁ, vedanaṁ … saññaṁ … saṅkhāre … viññāṇaṁ
sn22.42:1.3_2: parijānaṁ parimuccati rūpamhā, parimuccati vedanāya, parimuccati saññāya, parimuccati
sn22.42:1.3_3: saṅkhārehi, parimuccati viññāṇamhā, parimuccati jātiyā jarāmaraṇena sokehi paridevehi
sn22.42:1.3_4: dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, parimuccati dukkhasmāti vadāmī”ti. Dasamaṁ.
sn22.43:1.2: “Attadīpā, bhikkhave, viharatha attasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā, dhammadīpā dhammasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā.
sn22.43:1.3_0: Attadīpānaṁ, bhikkhave, viharataṁ attasaraṇānaṁ anaññasaraṇānaṁ, dhammadīpānaṁ dhammasaraṇānaṁ
sn22.43:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto,
sn22.43:2.3: rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.43:2.4: Tassa taṁ rūpaṁ vipariṇamati, aññathā ca hoti.
sn22.43:2.6: Vedanaṁ attato samanupassati, vedanāvantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā vedanaṁ, vedanāya vā attānaṁ.
sn22.43:2.7: Tassa sā vedanā vipariṇamati, aññathā ca hoti.
sn22.43:2.11: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.43:2.12: Tassa taṁ viññāṇaṁ vipariṇamati, aññathā ca hoti.
sn22.43:3.1_0: Rūpassa tveva, bhikkhave, aniccataṁ viditvā vipariṇāmaṁ virāgaṁ nirodhaṁ, ‘pubbe
sn22.43:3.1_1: ceva rūpaṁ etarahi ca sabbaṁ rūpaṁ aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhamman’ti, evametaṁ
sn22.43:3.1_2: yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato ye sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā te pahīyanti.
sn22.43:3.2: Tesaṁ pahānā na paritassati, aparitassaṁ sukhaṁ viharati, sukhavihārī bhikkhu ‘tadaṅganibbuto’ti vuccati.
sn22.43:3.3_0: Vedanāya tveva, bhikkhave, aniccataṁ viditvā vipariṇāmaṁ virāgaṁ nirodhaṁ, ‘pubbe
sn22.43:3.3_1: ceva vedanā etarahi ca sabbā vedanā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā’ti, evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ
sn22.43:3.3_2: sammappaññāya passato ye sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā te pahīyanti.
sn22.43:3.4: Tesaṁ pahānā na paritassati, aparitassaṁ sukhaṁ viharati, sukhavihārī bhikkhu ‘tadaṅganibbuto’ti vuccati.
sn22.43:3.6_0: saṅkhārānaṁ tveva, bhikkhave, aniccataṁ viditvā vipariṇāmaṁ virāgaṁ nirodhaṁ, ‘pubbe
sn22.43:3.6_1: ceva saṅkhārā etarahi ca sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā’ti, evametaṁ
sn22.43:3.6_2: yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato ye sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā te pahīyanti.
sn22.43:3.7: Tesaṁ pahānā na paritassati, aparitassaṁ sukhaṁ viharati, sukhavihārī bhikkhu ‘tadaṅganibbuto’ti vuccati.
sn22.43:3.8_0: Viññāṇassa tveva, bhikkhave, aniccataṁ viditvā vipariṇāmaṁ virāgaṁ nirodhaṁ, ‘pubbe
sn22.43:3.8_1: ceva viññāṇaṁ etarahi ca sabbaṁ viññāṇaṁ aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhamman’ti, evametaṁ
sn22.43:3.8_2: yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato ye sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā te pahīyanti.
sn22.43:3.9: Tesaṁ pahānā na paritassati, aparitassaṁ sukhaṁ viharati, sukhavihārī bhikkhu ‘tadaṅganibbuto’ti vuccatī”ti.
sn22.44:1.2: “Sakkāyasamudayagāminiñca vo, bhikkhave, paṭipadaṁ desessāmi, sakkāyanirodhagāminiñca paṭipadaṁ.
sn22.44:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto,
sn22.44:1.6: rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.44:1.10: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.44:1.11: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘sakkāyasamudayagāminī paṭipadā, sakkāyasamudayagāminī paṭipadā’ti.
sn22.44:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako ariyānaṁ dassāvī ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto, sappurisānaṁ dassāvī sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinīto,
sn22.44:2.3: na rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; na attani vā rūpaṁ, na rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.44:2.7: na viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, na viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; na attani vā viññāṇaṁ, na viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.44:2.8: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘sakkāyanirodhagāminī paṭipadā, sakkāyanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti.
sn22.45:1.5: yadanattā taṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.45:1.6: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato cittaṁ virajjati vimuccati anupādāya āsavehi.
sn22.45:1.13: yadanattā taṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.45:1.14: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato cittaṁ virajjati vimuccati anupādāya āsavehi.
sn22.45:1.15: Rūpadhātuyā ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cittaṁ virattaṁ vimuttaṁ hoti anupādāya āsavehi, vedanādhātuyā …pe…
sn22.45:1.18: viññāṇadhātuyā ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cittaṁ virattaṁ vimuttaṁ hoti anupādāya āsavehi.
sn22.45:1.19: Vimuttattā ṭhitaṁ. Ṭhitattā santusitaṁ. Santusitattā na paritassati. Aparitassaṁ paccattaññeva parinibbāyati.
sn22.45:1.20: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn22.46:1.5: yadanattā taṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.46:1.12: yadanattā taṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.46:2.1: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato pubbantānudiṭṭhiyo na honti.
sn22.46:2.3: Aparantānudiṭṭhīnaṁ asati, thāmaso parāmāso na hoti.
sn22.46:2.8: viññāṇasmiṁ cittaṁ virajjati vimuccati anupādāya āsavehi.
sn22.46:2.9: Vimuttattā ṭhitaṁ. Ṭhitattā santusitaṁ. Santusitattā na paritassati. Aparitassaṁ paccattaññeva parinibbāyati.
sn22.46:2.10: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn22.47:1.2: “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā anekavihitaṁ attānaṁ samanupassamānā samanupassanti, sabbete pañcupādānakkhandhe samanupassanti, etesaṁ vā aññataraṁ.
sn22.47:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto
sn22.47:1.5: rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.47:1.9: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.47:2.1: Iti ayañceva samanupassanā ‘asmī’ti cassa avigataṁ hoti.
sn22.47:2.2: ‘Asmī’ti kho pana, bhikkhave, avigate pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ avakkanti hoti—
sn22.47:2.4: Atthi, bhikkhave, mano, atthi dhammā, atthi avijjādhātu.
sn22.47:2.5: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa ‘asmī’tipissa hoti;
sn22.47:3.2: Athettha sutavato ariyasāvakassa avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjati.
sn22.48:1.5: Yaṁ kiñci, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā, ayaṁ vuccati rūpakkhandho.
sn22.48:1.8: ye keci saṅkhārā atītānāgatapaccuppannā ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikā vā sukhumā vā …pe… ayaṁ vuccati saṅkhārakkhandho.
sn22.48:1.9: Yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā, ayaṁ vuccati viññāṇakkhandho.
sn22.48:2.2: Yaṁ kiñci, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ …pe… yaṁ dūre santike vā sāsavaṁ upādāniyaṁ, ayaṁ vuccati rūpupādānakkhandho.
sn22.48:2.3: Yā kāci vedanā …pe… yā dūre santike vā sāsavā upādāniyā, ayaṁ vuccati vedanupādānakkhandho.
sn22.48:2.4: Yā kāci saññā …pe… yā dūre santike vā sāsavā upādāniyā, ayaṁ vuccati saññupādānakkhandho.
sn22.48:2.5: Ye keci saṅkhārā …pe… sāsavā upādāniyā, ayaṁ vuccati saṅkhārupādānakkhandho.
sn22.48:2.6: Yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ …pe… yaṁ dūre santike vā sāsavaṁ upādāniyaṁ, ayaṁ vuccati viññāṇupādānakkhandho.
sn22.49:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn22.49:1.3: Atha kho soṇo gahapatiputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe…
sn22.49:1.4: ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho soṇaṁ gahapatiputtaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn22.49:2.1: “Ye hi keci, soṇa, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā aniccena rūpena dukkhena vipariṇāmadhammena ‘seyyohamasmī’ti vā samanupassanti;
sn22.49:2.5: Aniccāya vedanāya dukkhāya vipariṇāmadhammāya ‘seyyohamasmī’ti vā samanupassanti;
sn22.49:2.10: aniccehi saṅkhārehi dukkhehi vipariṇāmadhammehi ‘seyyohamasmī’ti vā samanupassanti;
sn22.49:2.14: Aniccena viññāṇena dukkhena vipariṇāmadhammena ‘seyyohamasmī’ti vā samanupassanti;
sn22.49:3.1: Ye ca kho keci, soṇa, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā aniccena rūpena dukkhena vipariṇāmadhammena ‘seyyohamasmī’tipi na samanupassanti;
sn22.49:3.8: aniccena viññāṇena dukkhena vipariṇāmadhammena ‘seyyohamasmī’tipi na samanupassanti;
sn22.49:4.4: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.49:4.6: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn22.49:4.15: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.49:4.17: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn22.49:5.1_0: “Tasmātiha, soṇa, yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā
sn22.49:5.1_1: oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā, sabbaṁ rūpaṁ ‘netaṁ
sn22.49:5.1_2: mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.49:6.4_0: yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ
sn22.49:6.4_1: vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā, sabbaṁ viññāṇaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi,
sn22.49:6.4_2: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.49:7.1: Evaṁ passaṁ, soṇa, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi nibbindati, saññāyapi nibbindati, saṅkhāresupi nibbindati, viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati.
sn22.49:7.2: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.49:7.3: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn22.50:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn22.50:1.3: Atha kho soṇo gahapatiputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho soṇaṁ gahapatiputtaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn22.50:2.1: “Ye hi keci, soṇa, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā rūpaṁ nappajānanti, rūpasamudayaṁ nappajānanti, rūpanirodhaṁ nappajānanti, rūpanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ nappajānanti;
sn22.50:2.2: vedanaṁ nappajānanti, vedanāsamudayaṁ nappajānanti, vedanānirodhaṁ nappajānanti, vedanānirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ nappajānanti;
sn22.50:2.4: saṅkhāre nappajānanti, saṅkhārasamudayaṁ nappajānanti, saṅkhāranirodhaṁ nappajānanti, saṅkhāranirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ nappajānanti;
sn22.50:2.5: viññāṇaṁ nappajānanti, viññāṇasamudayaṁ nappajānanti, viññāṇanirodhaṁ nappajānanti, viññāṇanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ nappajānanti.
sn22.50:2.6_0: Na me te, soṇa, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu vā brāhmaṇasammatā,
sn22.50:2.6_1: na ca pana te āyasmanto sāmaññatthaṁ vā brahmaññatthaṁ vā diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā
sn22.50:3.1: Ye ca kho keci, soṇa, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā rūpaṁ pajānanti, rūpasamudayaṁ pajānanti, rūpanirodhaṁ pajānanti, rūpanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ pajānanti;
sn22.50:3.5: viññāṇaṁ pajānanti, viññāṇasamudayaṁ pajānanti, viññāṇanirodhaṁ pajānanti, viññāṇanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ pajānanti.
sn22.50:3.6_0: Te ca kho me, soṇa, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu ceva samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu
sn22.50:3.6_1: ca brāhmaṇasammatā, te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamme
sn22.51:1.2: “Aniccaññeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu rūpaṁ aniccanti passati. Sāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi.
sn22.51:1.6: Aniccaññeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vedanaṁ aniccanti passati. Sāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi.
sn22.51:1.10: Aniccaññeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saññaṁ aniccanti passati …pe…
sn22.51:1.11: anicceyeva bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṅkhāre aniccāti passati. Sāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi.
sn22.51:1.15: Aniccaññeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu viññāṇaṁ aniccanti passati. Sāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi.
sn22.52:1.2: “Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, rūpāniccatañca yathābhūtaṁ samanupassatha.
sn22.52:1.3: Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasi karonto, rūpāniccatañca yathābhūtaṁ samanupassanto rūpasmiṁ nibbindati.
sn22.52:1.6: Vedanaṁ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, vedanāniccatañca yathābhūtaṁ samanupassatha.
sn22.52:1.7: Vedanaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasi karonto, vedanāniccatañca yathābhūtaṁ samanupassanto vedanāya nibbindati.
sn22.52:1.11: saṅkhāre, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, saṅkhārāniccatañca yathābhūtaṁ samanupassatha.
sn22.52:1.12: Saṅkhāre, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasi karonto, saṅkhārāniccataṁ yathābhūtaṁ samanupassanto saṅkhāresu nibbindati.
sn22.52:1.15: Viññāṇaṁ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, viññāṇāniccatañca yathābhūtaṁ samanupassatha.
sn22.52:1.16: Viññāṇaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasi karonto, viññāṇāniccatañca yathābhūtaṁ samanupassanto viññāṇasmiṁ nibbindati.
sn22.53:1.3: Rūpupayaṁ vā, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṁ tiṭṭhamānaṁ tiṭṭheyya, rūpārammaṇaṁ rūpappatiṭṭhaṁ nandūpasecanaṁ vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyya.
sn22.53:1.6: saṅkhārupayaṁ vā, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṁ tiṭṭhamānaṁ tiṭṭheyya, saṅkhārārammaṇaṁ saṅkhārappatiṭṭhaṁ nandūpasecanaṁ vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyya.
sn22.53:2.2_0: ‘ahamaññatra rūpā aññatra vedanāya aññatra saññāya aññatra saṅkhārehi viññāṇassa
sn22.53:2.2_1: āgatiṁ vā gatiṁ vā cutiṁ vā upapattiṁ vā vuddhiṁ vā virūḷhiṁ vā vepullaṁ vā paññāpessāmī’ti,
sn22.53:3.1: Rūpadhātuyā ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno rāgo pahīno hoti.
sn22.53:3.2: Rāgassa pahānā vocchijjatārammaṇaṁ patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa na hoti.
sn22.53:3.6: viññāṇadhātuyā ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno rāgo pahīno hoti.
sn22.53:3.7: Rāgassa pahānā vocchijjatārammaṇaṁ patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa na hoti.
sn22.53:3.9: Vimuttattā ṭhitaṁ. Ṭhitattā santusitaṁ. Santusitattā na paritassati. Aparitassaṁ paccattaññeva parinibbāyati.
sn22.53:3.10: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn22.54:1.4: Mūlabījaṁ, khandhabījaṁ, aggabījaṁ, phalubījaṁ, bījabījaññeva pañcamaṁ.
sn22.54:1.5: Imāni cassu, bhikkhave, pañca bījajātāni akhaṇḍāni apūtikāni avātātapahatāni sārādāni sukhasayitāni, pathavī ca nāssa, āpo ca nāssa;
sn22.54:1.6: api numāni, bhikkhave, pañca bījajātāni vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyyun”ti?
sn22.54:1.8: “Imāni cassu, bhikkhave, pañca bījajātāni akhaṇḍāni …pe… sukhasayitāni, pathavī ca assa, āpo ca assa;
sn22.54:1.9: api numāni, bhikkhave, pañca bījajātāni vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyyun”ti?
sn22.54:1.11: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, pathavīdhātu, evaṁ catasso viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo daṭṭhabbā.
sn22.54:1.12: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, āpodhātu, evaṁ nandirāgo daṭṭhabbo.
sn22.54:1.13: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, pañca bījajātāni, evaṁ viññāṇaṁ sāhāraṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.54:2.1: Rūpupayaṁ, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṁ tiṭṭhamānaṁ tiṭṭheyya, rūpārammaṇaṁ rūpappatiṭṭhaṁ nandūpasecanaṁ vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyya.
sn22.54:2.2: Vedanupayaṁ vā, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṁ tiṭṭhamānaṁ tiṭṭheyya …pe…
sn22.54:2.3: saññupayaṁ vā, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṁ tiṭṭhamānaṁ tiṭṭheyya …pe…
sn22.54:2.4: saṅkhārupayaṁ vā, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṁ tiṭṭhamānaṁ tiṭṭheyya, saṅkhārārammaṇaṁ saṅkhārappatiṭṭhaṁ nandūpasecanaṁ vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyya.
sn22.54:3.2_0: ‘ahamaññatra rūpā aññatra vedanāya aññatra saññāya aññatra saṅkhārehi viññāṇassa
sn22.54:3.2_1: āgatiṁ vā gatiṁ vā cutiṁ vā upapattiṁ vā vuddhiṁ vā virūḷhiṁ vā vepullaṁ vā paññāpessāmī’ti,
sn22.54:4.1: Rūpadhātuyā ceva, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno rāgo pahīno hoti.
sn22.54:4.2: Rāgassa pahānā vocchijjatārammaṇaṁ patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa na hoti.
sn22.54:4.6: viññāṇadhātuyā ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno rāgo pahīno hoti.
sn22.54:4.7: Rāgassa pahānā vocchijjatārammaṇaṁ patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa na hoti.
sn22.54:4.9: Vimuttattā ṭhitaṁ. Ṭhitattā santusitaṁ. Santusitattā na paritassati. Aparitassaṁ paccattaññeva parinibbāyati.
sn22.55:1.3: “‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti—
sn22.55:1.4: evaṁ adhimuccamāno bhikkhu chindeyya orambhāgiyāni saṁyojanānī”ti.
sn22.55:1.5: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.55:1.6: “yathā kathaṁ pana, bhante, ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti—
sn22.55:1.7: evaṁ adhimuccamāno bhikkhu chindeyya orambhāgiyāni saṁyojanānī”ti?
sn22.55:2.2: sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.55:2.6: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.55:3.1: So aniccaṁ rūpaṁ ‘aniccaṁ rūpan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti,
sn22.55:7.1: Sutavā ca kho, bhikkhu, ariyasāvako ariyānaṁ dassāvī ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto sappurisānaṁ dassāvī sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinīto
sn22.55:8.1: So aniccaṁ rūpaṁ ‘aniccaṁ rūpan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
sn22.55:8.8: saṅkhataṁ rūpaṁ …pe… saṅkhataṁ viññāṇaṁ ‘saṅkhataṁ viññāṇan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
sn22.55:9.1: So rūpassa vibhavā, vedanāya vibhavā, saññāya vibhavā, saṅkhārānaṁ vibhavā, viññāṇassa vibhavā, evaṁ kho, bhikkhu,
sn22.55:9.2: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti—
sn22.55:9.3: evaṁ adhimuccamāno bhikkhu chindeyya orambhāgiyāni saṁyojanānī”ti.
sn22.55:9.4: “Evaṁ adhimuccamāno, bhante, bhikkhu chindeyya orambhāgiyāni saṁyojanānī”ti.
sn22.55:10.1: “Kathaṁ pana, bhante, jānato kathaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hotī”ti?
sn22.55:10.2: “Idha, bhikkhu, assutavā puthujjano atasitāye ṭhāne tāsaṁ āpajjati.
sn22.55:10.4: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.55:11.1: Sutavā ca kho, bhikkhu, ariyasāvako atasitāye ṭhāne na tāsaṁ āpajjati.
sn22.55:11.2: Na heso, bhikkhu, tāso sutavato ariyasāvakassa:
sn22.55:11.3: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.55:11.4: Rūpupayaṁ vā, bhikkhu, viññāṇaṁ tiṭṭhamānaṁ tiṭṭheyya, rūpārammaṇaṁ rūpappatiṭṭhaṁ nandūpasecanaṁ vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyya.
sn22.55:11.7: saṅkhārupayaṁ vā, bhikkhu, viññāṇaṁ tiṭṭhamānaṁ tiṭṭheyya, saṅkhārārammaṇaṁ saṅkhārappatiṭṭhaṁ nandūpasecanaṁ vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyya.
sn22.55:12.2_0: ‘ahamaññatra rūpā, aññatra vedanāya, aññatra saññāya, aññatra saṅkhārehi viññāṇassa
sn22.55:12.2_1: āgatiṁ vā gatiṁ vā cutiṁ vā upapattiṁ vā vuddhiṁ vā virūḷhiṁ vā vepullaṁ vā paññāpessāmī’ti,
sn22.55:13.1: Rūpadhātuyā ce, bhikkhu, bhikkhuno rāgo pahīno hoti. Rāgassa pahānā vocchijjatārammaṇaṁ patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa na hoti.
sn22.55:13.5: viññāṇadhātuyā ce, bhikkhu, bhikkhuno rāgo pahīno hoti. Rāgassa pahānā vocchijjatārammaṇaṁ patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa na hoti.
sn22.55:13.7: Vimuttattā ṭhitaṁ. Ṭhitattā santusitaṁ. Santusitattā na paritassati. Aparitassaṁ paccattaññeva parinibbāyati.
sn22.55:13.9: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hotī”ti.
sn22.56:1.5_0: Yāvakīvañcāhaṁ, bhikkhave, ime pañcupādānakkhandhe catuparivaṭṭaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nābbhaññāsiṁ,
sn22.56:1.5_1: neva tāvāhaṁ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya
sn22.56:1.6: Yato ca khvāhaṁ, bhikkhave, ime pañcupādānakkhandhe catuparivaṭṭaṁ yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, athāhaṁ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke …pe…
sn22.56:2.2: Rūpaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, rūpasamudayaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, rūpanirodhaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, rūpanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ;
sn22.56:2.6: viññāṇaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, viññāṇasamudayaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, viññāṇanirodhaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, viññāṇanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ.
sn22.56:3.2: Cattāro ca mahābhūtā catunnañca mahābhūtānaṁ upādāya rūpaṁ.
sn22.56:3.6: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo rūpanirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.56:4.1_0: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ rūpaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ rūpasamudayaṁ
sn22.56:4.1_1: abhiññāya, evaṁ rūpanirodhaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ rūpanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ abhiññāya
sn22.56:4.1_2: rūpassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipannā, te suppaṭipannā.
sn22.56:4.2: Ye suppaṭipannā, te imasmiṁ dhammavinaye gādhanti.
sn22.56:5.1_0: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ rūpaṁ abhiññāya …pe… evaṁ rūpanirodhagāminiṁ
sn22.56:5.1_1: paṭipadaṁ abhiññāya, rūpassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimuttā te suvimuttā.
sn22.56:5.3: Ye kevalino vaṭṭaṁ tesaṁ natthi paññāpanāya.
sn22.56:6.3: cakkhusamphassajā vedanā, sotasamphassajā vedanā, ghānasamphassajā vedanā, jivhāsamphassajā vedanā, kāyasamphassajā vedanā, manosamphassajā vedanā.
sn22.56:6.7: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.56:7.1_0: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ vedanaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ vedanāsamudayaṁ
sn22.56:7.1_1: abhiññāya, evaṁ vedanānirodhaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ vedanānirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ abhiññāya
sn22.56:7.1_2: vedanāya nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipannā, te suppaṭipannā.
sn22.56:7.2: Ye suppaṭipannā, te imasmiṁ dhammavinaye gādhanti.
sn22.56:8.1: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ vedanaṁ abhiññāya …pe… evaṁ vedanānirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ abhiññāya …pe…
sn22.56:9.3: rūpasaññā, saddasaññā, gandhasaññā, rasasaññā, phoṭṭhabbasaññā, dhammasaññā.
sn22.56:9.7: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saññānirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.56:10.3: rūpasañcetanā, saddasañcetanā, gandhasañcetanā, rasasañcetanā, phoṭṭhabbasañcetanā, dhammasañcetanā.
sn22.56:10.7: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saṅkhāranirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.56:11.1_0: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ saṅkhāre abhiññāya, evaṁ saṅkhārasamudayaṁ
sn22.56:11.1_1: abhiññāya, evaṁ saṅkhāranirodhaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ saṅkhāranirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ
sn22.56:11.1_2: abhiññāya saṅkhārānaṁ nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipannā, te suppaṭipannā.
sn22.56:11.2: Ye suppaṭipannā, te imasmiṁ dhammavinaye gādhanti.
sn22.56:12.1_0: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ saṅkhāre abhiññāya, evaṁ saṅkhārasamudayaṁ
sn22.56:12.1_1: abhiññāya, evaṁ saṅkhāranirodhaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ saṅkhāranirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ
sn22.56:12.1_2: abhiññāya saṅkhārānaṁ nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimuttā, te suvimuttā.
sn22.56:12.3: Ye kevalino vaṭṭaṁ tesaṁ natthi paññāpanāya.
sn22.56:13.3: cakkhuviññāṇaṁ, sotaviññāṇaṁ, ghānaviññāṇaṁ, jivhāviññāṇaṁ, kāyaviññāṇaṁ, manoviññāṇaṁ.
sn22.56:13.7: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo viññāṇanirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.56:14.1_0: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ viññāṇaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ viññāṇasamudayaṁ
sn22.56:14.1_1: abhiññāya, evaṁ viññāṇanirodhaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ viññāṇanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ abhiññāya
sn22.56:14.1_2: viññāṇassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipannā, te suppaṭipannā.
sn22.56:14.2: Ye suppaṭipannā, te imasmiṁ dhammavinaye gādhanti.
sn22.56:15.1_0: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ viññāṇaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ viññāṇasamudayaṁ
sn22.56:15.1_1: abhiññāya, evaṁ viññāṇanirodhaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ viññāṇanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ abhiññāya
sn22.56:15.1_2: viññāṇassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimuttā, te suvimuttā.
sn22.56:15.3: Ye kevalino vaṭṭaṁ tesaṁ natthi paññāpanāyā”ti.
sn22.57:1.2: “Sattaṭṭhānakusalo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tividhūpaparikkhī imasmiṁ dhammavinaye kevalī vusitavā uttamapurisoti vuccati.
sn22.57:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu rūpaṁ pajānāti, rūpasamudayaṁ pajānāti, rūpanirodhaṁ pajānāti, rūpanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ pajānāti;
sn22.57:1.5: rūpassa assādaṁ pajānāti, rūpassa ādīnavaṁ pajānāti, rūpassa nissaraṇaṁ pajānāti;
sn22.57:1.9: viññāṇaṁ pajānāti, viññāṇasamudayaṁ pajānāti, viññāṇanirodhaṁ pajānāti, viññāṇanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ pajānāti;
sn22.57:1.10: viññāṇassa assādaṁ pajānāti, viññāṇassa ādīnavaṁ pajānāti, viññāṇassa nissaraṇaṁ pajānāti.
sn22.57:2.2: Cattāro ca mahābhūtā, catunnañca mahābhūtānaṁ upādāya rūpaṁ.
sn22.57:2.6: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo rūpanirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.57:3.1: Yaṁ rūpaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ—
sn22.57:4.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ rūpaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ rūpasamudayaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ rūpanirodhaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ rūpanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ abhiññāya;
sn22.57:4.2: evaṁ rūpassa assādaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ rūpassa ādīnavaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ rūpassa nissaraṇaṁ abhiññāya rūpassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipannā, te suppaṭipannā.
sn22.57:4.3: Ye suppaṭipannā, te imasmiṁ dhammavinaye gādhanti.
sn22.57:5.1: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ rūpaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ rūpasamudayaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ rūpanirodhaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ rūpanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ abhiññāya;
sn22.57:5.2: evaṁ rūpassa assādaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ rūpassa ādīnavaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ rūpassa nissaraṇaṁ abhiññāya rūpassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimuttā, te suvimuttā.
sn22.57:5.4: Ye kevalino vaṭṭaṁ tesaṁ natthi paññāpanāya.
sn22.57:6.8: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.57:7.1: Yaṁ vedanaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ—
sn22.57:8.1: Ye hi, keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ vedanaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ vedanāsamudayaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ vedanānirodhaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ vedanānirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ abhiññāya;
sn22.57:8.2: evaṁ vedanāya assādaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ vedanāya ādīnavaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ vedanāya nissaraṇaṁ abhiññāya vedanāya nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipannā, te suppaṭipannā.
sn22.57:8.3: Ye suppaṭipannā, te imasmiṁ dhammavinaye gādhanti.
sn22.57:9.1: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ vedanaṁ abhiññāya …pe…
sn22.57:10.3: rūpasaññā, saddasaññā, gandhasaññā, rasasaññā, phoṭṭhabbasaññā, dhammasaññā.
sn22.57:10.7: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saññānirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.57:11.8: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saṅkhāranirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.57:12.1: Yaṁ saṅkhāre paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ—
sn22.57:13.1_0: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ saṅkhāre abhiññāya, evaṁ saṅkhārasamudayaṁ
sn22.57:13.1_1: abhiññāya, evaṁ saṅkhāranirodhaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ saṅkhāranirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ
sn22.57:13.1_2: abhiññāya …pe… saṅkhārānaṁ nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipannā te suppaṭipannā.
sn22.57:13.2: Ye suppaṭipannā, te imasmiṁ dhammavinaye gādhanti …pe…
sn22.57:14.3: cakkhuviññāṇaṁ, sotaviññāṇaṁ, ghānaviññāṇaṁ, jivhāviññāṇaṁ, kāyaviññāṇaṁ, manoviññāṇaṁ.
sn22.57:14.7: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo viññāṇanirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.57:15.1: Yaṁ viññāṇaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ—
sn22.57:16.1_0: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ viññāṇaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ viññāṇasamudayaṁ
sn22.57:16.1_1: abhiññāya, evaṁ viññāṇanirodhaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ viññāṇanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ abhiññāya;
sn22.57:16.2: evaṁ viññāṇassa assādaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ viññāṇassa ādīnavaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ viññāṇassa nissaraṇaṁ abhiññāya viññāṇassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipannā, te suppaṭipannā.
sn22.57:16.3: Ye suppaṭipannā, te imasmiṁ dhammavinaye gādhanti.
sn22.57:17.1_0: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ viññāṇaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ viññāṇasamudayaṁ
sn22.57:17.1_1: abhiññāya, evaṁ viññāṇanirodhaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ viññāṇanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ abhiññāya;
sn22.57:17.2: evaṁ viññāṇassa assādaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ viññāṇassa ādīnavaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ viññāṇassa nissaraṇaṁ abhiññāya viññāṇassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimuttā, te suvimuttā.
sn22.57:17.4: Ye kevalino vaṭṭaṁ tesaṁ natthi paññāpanāya.
sn22.57:17.5: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sattaṭṭhānakusalo hoti.
sn22.57:18.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhātuso upaparikkhati, āyatanaso upaparikkhati, paṭiccasamuppādaso upaparikkhati.
sn22.57:18.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tividhūpaparikkhī hoti.
sn22.57:18.4: Sattaṭṭhānakusalo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tividhūpaparikkhī, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye kevalī vusitavā ‘uttamapuriso’ti vuccatī”ti.
sn22.58:1.2: “Tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho rūpassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto sammāsambuddhoti vuccati.
sn22.58:1.3: Bhikkhupi, bhikkhave, paññāvimutto rūpassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto paññāvimuttoti vuccati.
sn22.58:2.1: Tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vedanāya nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto sammāsambuddhoti vuccati.
sn22.58:2.2: Bhikkhupi, bhikkhave, paññāvimutto vedanāya nibbidā …pe… paññāvimuttoti vuccati.
sn22.58:3.3: viññāṇassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto sammāsambuddhoti vuccati.
sn22.58:3.4: Bhikkhupi, bhikkhave, paññāvimutto viññāṇassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto paññāvimuttoti vuccati.
sn22.58:4.1: Tatra kho, bhikkhave, ko viseso, ko adhippayāso, kiṁ nānākaraṇaṁ, tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa paññāvimuttena bhikkhunā”ti?
sn22.58:4.2_0: “Bhagavaṁmūlakā no, bhante, dhammā bhagavaṁnettikā bhagavaṁpaṭisaraṇā. Sādhu vata,
sn22.58:4.2_1: bhante, bhagavantaññeva paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho. Bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
sn22.58:4.3: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn22.58:4.4: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
sn22.58:5.1: “Tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā, asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā, anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā maggaññū, maggavidū, maggakovido;
sn22.58:5.2: maggānugā ca, bhikkhave, etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchā samannāgatā.
sn22.58:5.3: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhave, viseso, ayaṁ adhippayāso, idaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa paññāvimuttena bhikkhunā”ti.
sn22.59:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṁ viharati isipatane migadāye.
sn22.59:1.2: Tatra kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn22.59:2.2: Rūpañca hidaṁ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, nayidaṁ rūpaṁ ābādhāya saṁvatteyya, labbhetha ca rūpe:
sn22.59:2.3: ‘evaṁ me rūpaṁ hotu, evaṁ me rūpaṁ mā ahosī’ti.
sn22.59:2.4: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ anattā, tasmā rūpaṁ ābādhāya saṁvattati, na ca labbhati rūpe:
sn22.59:2.5: ‘evaṁ me rūpaṁ hotu, evaṁ me rūpaṁ mā ahosī’ti.
sn22.59:3.2: Vedanā ca hidaṁ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, nayidaṁ vedanā ābādhāya saṁvatteyya, labbhetha ca vedanāya:
sn22.59:3.3: ‘evaṁ me vedanā hotu, evaṁ me vedanā mā ahosī’ti.
sn22.59:3.4: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, vedanā anattā, tasmā vedanā ābādhāya saṁvattati, na ca labbhati vedanāya:
sn22.59:3.5: ‘evaṁ me vedanā hotu, evaṁ me vedanā mā ahosī’ti.
sn22.59:4.3: Saṅkhārā ca hidaṁ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissaṁsu, nayidaṁ saṅkhārā ābādhāya saṁvatteyyuṁ, labbhetha ca saṅkhāresu:
sn22.59:4.4: ‘evaṁ me saṅkhārā hontu, evaṁ me saṅkhārā mā ahesun’ti.
sn22.59:4.5: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, saṅkhārā anattā, tasmā saṅkhārā ābādhāya saṁvattanti, na ca labbhati saṅkhāresu:
sn22.59:4.6: ‘evaṁ me saṅkhārā hontu, evaṁ me saṅkhārā mā ahesun’ti.
sn22.59:5.2: Viññāṇañca hidaṁ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, nayidaṁ viññāṇaṁ ābādhāya saṁvatteyya, labbhetha ca viññāṇe:
sn22.59:5.3: ‘evaṁ me viññāṇaṁ hotu, evaṁ me viññāṇaṁ mā ahosī’ti.
sn22.59:5.4: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṁ anattā, tasmā viññāṇaṁ ābādhāya saṁvattati, na ca labbhati viññāṇe:
sn22.59:5.5: ‘evaṁ me viññāṇaṁ hotu, evaṁ me viññāṇaṁ mā ahosī’ti.
sn22.59:6.4: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.59:6.6: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn22.59:6.14: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.59:6.16: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn22.59:7.1_0: “Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā
sn22.59:7.1_1: vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā, sabbaṁ rūpaṁ:
sn22.59:7.1_2: ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.59:8.1_0: Yā kāci vedanā atītānāgatapaccuppannā ajjhattā vā bahiddhā vā …pe… yā dūre santike
sn22.59:8.1_1: vā, sabbā vedanā: ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ
sn22.59:9.2_0: ye keci saṅkhārā atītānāgatapaccuppannā ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā …pe… ye dūre santike
sn22.59:9.2_1: vā, sabbe saṅkhārā: ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ
sn22.59:10.1_0: Yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ
sn22.59:10.1_1: vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā, sabbaṁ viññāṇaṁ: ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi,
sn22.59:10.1_2: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.59:11.1: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi nibbindati, saññāyapi nibbindati, saṅkhāresupi nibbindati, viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati.
sn22.59:11.2: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.59:11.3: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn22.59:12.2: Attamanā pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanduṁ.
sn22.59:12.3: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne pañcavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṁsūti.
sn22.60:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
sn22.60:1.3: Atha kho mahāli licchavi yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe… ekamantaṁ nisinno kho mahāli licchavi bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.60:2.4: Natthi hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṁ visuddhiyā;
sn22.60:3.1: “Atthi, mahāli, hetu atthi paccayo sattānaṁ saṅkilesāya;
sn22.60:3.3: Atthi, mahāli, hetu, atthi paccayo sattānaṁ visuddhiyā;
sn22.60:4.1: “Katamo pana, bhante, hetu katamo paccayo sattānaṁ saṅkilesāya;
sn22.60:5.1: “Rūpañca hidaṁ, mahāli, ekantadukkhaṁ abhavissa dukkhānupatitaṁ dukkhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ sukhena, nayidaṁ sattā rūpasmiṁ sārajjeyyuṁ.
sn22.60:5.2: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, rūpaṁ sukhaṁ sukhānupatitaṁ sukhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ dukkhena, tasmā sattā rūpasmiṁ sārajjanti;
sn22.60:5.4: Ayaṁ kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo sattānaṁ saṅkilesāya;
sn22.60:6.1: Vedanā ca hidaṁ, mahāli, ekantadukkhā abhavissa dukkhānupatitā dukkhāvakkantā anavakkantā sukhena, nayidaṁ sattā vedanāya sārajjeyyuṁ.
sn22.60:6.2: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, vedanā sukhā sukhānupatitā sukhāvakkantā anavakkantā dukkhena, tasmā sattā vedanāya sārajjanti;
sn22.60:6.5: Ayampi kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo sattānaṁ saṅkilesāya.
sn22.60:7.2: saṅkhārā ca hidaṁ, mahāli, ekantadukkhā abhavissaṁsu dukkhānupatitā dukkhāvakkantā anavakkantā sukhena, nayidaṁ sattā saṅkhāresu sārajjeyyuṁ.
sn22.60:7.3: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, saṅkhārā sukhā sukhānupatitā sukhāvakkantā anavakkantā dukkhena, tasmā sattā saṅkhāresu sārajjanti;
sn22.60:7.6: Ayampi kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo sattānaṁ saṅkilesāya.
sn22.60:8.1: Viññāṇañca hidaṁ, mahāli, ekantadukkhaṁ abhavissa dukkhānupatitaṁ dukkhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ sukhena, nayidaṁ sattā viññāṇasmiṁ sārajjeyyuṁ.
sn22.60:8.2: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, viññāṇaṁ sukhaṁ sukhānupatitaṁ sukhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ dukkhena, tasmā sattā viññāṇasmiṁ sārajjanti;
sn22.60:8.4: Ayampi kho, mahāli, hetu ayaṁ paccayo sattānaṁ saṅkilesāya.
sn22.60:9.1: “Katamo pana, bhante, hetu katamo paccayo sattānaṁ visuddhiyā;
sn22.60:9.3: “Rūpañca hidaṁ, mahāli, ekantasukhaṁ abhavissa sukhānupatitaṁ sukhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ dukkhena, nayidaṁ sattā rūpasmiṁ nibbindeyyuṁ.
sn22.60:9.4: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, rūpaṁ dukkhaṁ dukkhānupatitaṁ dukkhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ sukhena, tasmā sattā rūpasmiṁ nibbindanti;
sn22.60:9.6: Ayaṁ kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo, sattānaṁ visuddhiyā.
sn22.60:10.1: Vedanā ca hidaṁ, mahāli, ekantasukhā abhavissa …pe…
sn22.60:10.3: saṅkhārā ca hidaṁ, mahāli, ekantasukhā abhavissaṁsu …pe…
sn22.60:10.4: viññāṇañca hidaṁ, mahāli, ekantasukhaṁ abhavissa sukhānupatitaṁ sukhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ dukkhena, nayidaṁ sattā viññāṇasmiṁ nibbindeyyuṁ.
sn22.60:10.5: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, viññāṇaṁ dukkhaṁ dukkhānupatitaṁ dukkhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ sukhena, tasmā sattā viññāṇasmiṁ nibbindanti;
sn22.60:10.7: Ayaṁ kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo, sattānaṁ visuddhiyā.
sn22.61:1.2: “Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, ādittaṁ, vedanā ādittā, saññā ādittā, saṅkhārā ādittā, viññāṇaṁ ādittaṁ.
sn22.61:1.3: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi … saññāyapi … saṅkhāresupi … viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati.
sn22.61:1.4: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.61:1.5: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn22.62:1.2: “Tayome, bhikkhave, niruttipathā adhivacanapathā paññattipathā asaṅkiṇṇā asaṅkiṇṇapubbā, na saṅkīyanti, na saṅkīyissanti, appaṭikuṭṭhā samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
sn22.62:1.4: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ atītaṁ niruddhaṁ vipariṇataṁ ‘ahosī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘ahosī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘ahosī’ti tassa paññatti;
sn22.62:1.5: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.62:2.1: Yā vedanā atītā niruddhā vipariṇatā ‘ahosī’ti tassā saṅkhā, ‘ahosī’ti tassā samaññā, ‘ahosī’ti tassā paññatti;
sn22.62:2.2: na tassā saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassā saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.62:3.2: ye saṅkhārā atītā niruddhā vipariṇatā ‘ahesun’ti tesaṁ saṅkhā, ‘ahesun’ti tesaṁ samaññā, ‘ahesun’ti tesaṁ paññatti;
sn22.62:3.3: na tesaṁ saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tesaṁ saṅkhā ‘bhavissantī’ti.
sn22.62:4.1: Yaṁ viññāṇaṁ atītaṁ niruddhaṁ vipariṇataṁ, ‘ahosī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘ahosī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘ahosī’ti tassa paññatti;
sn22.62:4.2: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.62:5.1: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ ajātaṁ apātubhūtaṁ, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa paññatti;
sn22.62:5.2: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti.
sn22.62:6.1: Yā vedanā ajātā apātubhūtā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassā saṅkhā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassā samaññā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassā paññatti;
sn22.62:6.2: na tassā saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassā saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti.
sn22.62:7.2: ye saṅkhārā ajātā apātubhūtā, ‘bhavissantī’ti tesaṁ saṅkhā, ‘bhavissantī’ti tesaṁ samaññā, ‘bhavissantī’ti tesaṁ paññatti;
sn22.62:7.3: na tesaṁ saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tesaṁ saṅkhā ‘ahesun’ti.
sn22.62:8.1: Yaṁ viññāṇaṁ ajātaṁ apātubhūtaṁ, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa paññatti;
sn22.62:8.2: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti.
sn22.62:9.1: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ jātaṁ pātubhūtaṁ, ‘atthī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘atthī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘atthī’ti tassa paññatti;
sn22.62:9.2: na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.62:10.1: Yā vedanā jātā pātubhūtā, ‘atthī’ti tassā saṅkhā, ‘atthī’ti tassā samaññā, ‘atthī’ti tassā paññatti;
sn22.62:10.2: na tassā saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti, na tassā saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.62:11.2: ye saṅkhārā jātā pātubhūtā, ‘atthī’ti tesaṁ saṅkhā, ‘atthī’ti tesaṁ samaññā, ‘atthī’ti tesaṁ paññatti;
sn22.62:11.3: na tesaṁ saṅkhā ‘ahesun’ti, na tesaṁ saṅkhā, ‘bhavissantī’ti.
sn22.62:12.1: Yaṁ viññāṇaṁ jātaṁ pātubhūtaṁ, ‘atthī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘atthī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘atthī’ti tassa paññatti;
sn22.62:12.2: na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.62:13.1: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo niruttipathā adhivacanapathā paññattipathā asaṅkiṇṇā asaṅkiṇṇapubbā, na saṅkīyanti, na saṅkīyissanti, appaṭikuṭṭhā samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
sn22.62:13.2_0: Yepi te, bhikkhave, ahesuṁ ukkalā vassabhaññā ahetukavādā akiriyavādā natthikavādā,
sn22.62:13.2_1: tepime tayo niruttipathe adhivacanapathe paññattipathe na garahitabbaṁ nappaṭikkositabbaṁ amaññiṁsu.
sn22.63:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn22.63:1.3: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.63:1.4: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṁ desetu yamahaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.63:2.1: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsī”ti?
sn22.63:2.10: Imassa khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmī”ti.
sn22.63:3.2: Sādhu kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsi.
sn22.63:3.3: Rūpaṁ kho, bhikkhu, upādiyamāno baddho mārassa;
sn22.63:3.10: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
sn22.63:4.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
sn22.63:4.2_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya
sn22.63:4.2_1: kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ
sn22.63:4.2_2: diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
sn22.63:4.3: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn22.63:4.4: Aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṁ ahosīti.

sn22.71:1.2: Atha kho āyasmā rādho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.71:1.3: “kathaṁ nu kho, bhante, jānato, kathaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na hontī”ti?
sn22.71:1.4_0: “Yaṁ kiñci, rādha, rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ
sn22.71:1.4_1: vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā, sabbaṁ rūpaṁ: ‘netaṁ mama,
sn22.71:1.4_2: nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
sn22.71:1.8: yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ …pe… yaṁ dūre santike vā, sabbaṁ viññāṇaṁ: ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
sn22.71:1.9: Evaṁ kho, rādha, jānato evaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na hontī”ti …pe…
sn22.71:1.10: aññataro ca panāyasmā rādho arahataṁ ahosīti.
sn22.72:1.2: Atha kho āyasmā surādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.72:1.3_0: “kathaṁ nu kho, bhante, jānato kathaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā
sn22.72:1.3_1: ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānāpagataṁ mānasaṁ hoti, vidhā samatikkantaṁ
sn22.72:1.4_0: “Yaṁ kiñci, surādha, rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ …pe… yaṁ dūre santike vā, sabbaṁ
sn22.72:1.4_1: rūpaṁ: ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya
sn22.72:1.8: yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā, sabbā vedanā …pe…
sn22.72:1.11: sabbaṁ viññāṇaṁ: ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā anupādāvimutto hoti.
sn22.72:1.12_0: Evaṁ kho, surādha, jānato evaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu
sn22.72:1.12_1: ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānāpagataṁ mānasaṁ hoti vidhā samatikkantaṁ santaṁ suvimuttan”ti …pe…
sn22.72:1.13: aññataro ca panāyasmā surādho arahataṁ ahosīti.
sn22.73:1.2: “Assutavā, bhikkhave, puthujjano rūpassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
sn22.73:1.6: viññāṇassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
sn22.73:1.7: Sutavā ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako rūpassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
sn22.73:1.11: viññāṇassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānātī”ti.
sn22.74:1.2: “Assutavā, bhikkhave, puthujjano rūpassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
sn22.74:1.6: viññāṇassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
sn22.74:1.7: Sutavā ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako rūpassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
sn22.74:1.11: viññāṇassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānātī”ti.
sn22.75:1.2: “Sutavā, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako rūpassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
sn22.75:1.6: viññāṇassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānātī”ti.
sn22.76:1.5: yadanattā taṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.76:1.12: yadanattā taṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.76:2.1: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi … saññāyapi … saṅkhāresupi … viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati.
sn22.76:2.2: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.76:2.3: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
sn22.76:2.4: Yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattāvāsā, yāvatā bhavaggaṁ, ete aggā, ete seṭṭhā lokasmiṁ yadidaṁ arahanto”ti.
sn22.76:3.2: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
sn22.77:1.5: yadanattā taṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti …pe… evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.77:2.1: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi … saññāyapi … saṅkhāresupi … viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati.
sn22.77:2.2: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.77:2.3: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
sn22.77:2.4: Yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattāvāsā, yāvatā bhavaggaṁ, ete aggā, ete seṭṭhā lokasmiṁ yadidaṁ arahanto”ti.
sn22.78:1.2_0: “Sīho, bhikkhave, migarājā sāyanhasamayaṁ āsayā nikkhamati; āsayā nikkhamitvā vijambhati;
sn22.78:1.2_1: vijambhitvā samantā catuddisā anuviloketi; samantā catuddisā anuviloketvā tikkhattuṁ
sn22.78:1.2_2: sīhanādaṁ nadati; tikkhattuṁ sīhanādaṁ naditvā gocarāya pakkamati.
sn22.78:1.3_0: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, tiracchānagatā pāṇā sīhassa migarañño nadato saddaṁ suṇanti;
sn22.78:1.3_1: yebhuyyena bhayaṁ saṁvegaṁ santāsaṁ āpajjanti; bilaṁ bilāsayā pavisanti; dakaṁ dakāsayā
sn22.78:1.3_2: pavisanti; vanaṁ vanāsayā pavisanti; ākāsaṁ pakkhino bhajanti.
sn22.78:1.4_0: Yepi te, bhikkhave, rañño nāgā gāmanigamarājadhānīsu, daḷhehi varattehi baddhā, tepi
sn22.78:1.4_1: tāni bandhanāni sañchinditvā sampadāletvā bhītā muttakarīsaṁ cajamānā, yena vā tena vā palāyanti.
sn22.78:1.5: Evaṁ mahiddhiko kho, bhikkhave, sīho migarājā tiracchānagatānaṁ pāṇānaṁ, evaṁ mahesakkho, evaṁ mahānubhāvo.
sn22.78:2.1_0: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yadā tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno
sn22.78:2.1_1: sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā. So dhammaṁ deseti:
sn22.78:2.2: ‘iti rūpaṁ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo;
sn22.78:2.6: iti viññāṇaṁ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti.
sn22.78:2.7: Yepi te, bhikkhave, devā dīghāyukā vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā uccesu vimānesu ciraṭṭhitikā tepi tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṁ sutvā yebhuyyena bhayaṁ saṁvegaṁ santāsaṁ āpajjanti:
sn22.78:2.8: ‘aniccāva kira, bho, mayaṁ samānā niccamhāti amaññimha.
sn22.78:2.9: Addhuvāva kira, bho, mayaṁ samānā dhuvamhāti amaññimha.
sn22.78:2.10: Asassatāva kira, bho, mayaṁ samānā sassatamhāti amaññimha.
sn22.78:2.11: Mayampi kira, bho, aniccā addhuvā asassatā sakkāyapariyāpannā’ti.
sn22.78:2.12: Evaṁ mahiddhiko kho, bhikkhave, tathāgato sadevakassa lokassa, evaṁ mahesakkho, evaṁ mahānubhāvo”ti.
sn22.79:1.2: “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussaramānā anussaranti sabbete pañcupādānakkhandhe anussaranti etesaṁ vā aññataraṁ.
sn22.79:1.5: iti vā hi, bhikkhave, anussaramāno rūpaṁyeva anussarati.
sn22.79:1.7: iti vā hi, bhikkhave, anussaramāno vedanaṁyeva anussarati.
sn22.79:1.11: iti vā hi, bhikkhave, anussaramāno viññāṇameva anussarati.
sn22.79:2.4: Sītenapi ruppati, uṇhenapi ruppati, jighacchāyapi ruppati, pipāsāyapi ruppati, ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassenapi ruppati.
sn22.79:3.4: Sukhampi vedayati, dukkhampi vedayati, adukkhamasukhampi vedayati.
sn22.79:4.4: Nīlampi sañjānāti, pītakampi sañjānāti, lohitakampi sañjānāti, odātampi sañjānāti.
sn22.79:5.4_0: Rūpaṁ rūpattāya saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharonti, vedanaṁ vedanattāya saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharonti,
sn22.79:5.4_1: saññaṁ saññattāya saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharonti, saṅkhāre saṅkhārattāya saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharonti,
sn22.79:6.4: Ambilampi vijānāti, tittakampi vijānāti, kaṭukampi vijānāti, madhurampi vijānāti, khārikampi vijānāti, akhārikampi vijānāti, loṇikampi vijānāti, aloṇikampi vijānāti.
sn22.79:7.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
sn22.79:7.3: Atītampāhaṁ addhānaṁ evameva rūpena khajjiṁ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannena rūpena khajjāmi.
sn22.79:7.4: Ahañceva kho pana anāgataṁ rūpaṁ abhinandeyyaṁ, anāgatampāhaṁ addhānaṁ evameva rūpena khajjeyyaṁ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannena rūpena khajjāmī’ti.
sn22.79:7.5: So iti paṭisaṅkhāya atītasmiṁ rūpasmiṁ anapekkho hoti;
sn22.79:7.7: paccuppannassa rūpassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn22.79:8.2: Atītampāhaṁ addhānaṁ evameva vedanāya khajjiṁ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannāya vedanāya khajjāmi.
sn22.79:8.3: Ahañceva kho pana anāgataṁ vedanaṁ abhinandeyyaṁ;
sn22.79:8.4: anāgatampāhaṁ addhānaṁ evameva vedanāya khajjeyyaṁ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannāya vedanāya khajjāmī’ti.
sn22.79:8.5: So iti paṭisaṅkhāya atītāya vedanāya anapekkho hoti;
sn22.79:8.7: paccuppannāya vedanāya nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn22.79:9.3: Atītampāhaṁ addhānaṁ evameva saṅkhārehi khajjiṁ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannehi saṅkhārehi khajjāmīti.
sn22.79:9.4: Ahañceva kho pana anāgate saṅkhāre abhinandeyyaṁ;
sn22.79:9.5: anāgatampāhaṁ addhānaṁ evameva saṅkhārehi khajjeyyaṁ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannehi saṅkhārehi khajjāmī’ti.
sn22.79:9.6: So iti paṭisaṅkhāya atītesu saṅkhāresu anapekkho hoti;
sn22.79:9.8: paccuppannānaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn22.79:10.2: Atītampi addhānaṁ evameva viññāṇena khajjiṁ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannena viññāṇena khajjāmi.
sn22.79:10.3: Ahañceva kho pana anāgataṁ viññāṇaṁ abhinandeyyaṁ;
sn22.79:10.4: anāgatampāhaṁ addhānaṁ evameva viññāṇena khajjeyyaṁ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannena viññāṇena khajjāmī’ti.
sn22.79:10.5: So iti paṭisaṅkhāya atītasmiṁ viññāṇasmiṁ anapekkho hoti;
sn22.79:10.7: paccuppannassa viññāṇassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn22.79:11.4: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.79:11.6: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn22.79:11.14: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.79:11.16: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn22.79:11.19_0: “Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā
sn22.79:11.19_1: vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā, sabbaṁ rūpaṁ:
sn22.79:11.19_2: ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.79:11.23: yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ …pe… yaṁ dūre santike vā, sabbaṁ viññāṇaṁ: ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.79:12.1: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako apacināti, no ācināti;
sn22.79:13.1: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi … saññāyapi … saṅkhāresupi … viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati.
sn22.79:13.2: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.79:13.3: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
sn22.79:14.1_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nevācināti na apacināti, apacinitvā ṭhito; neva
sn22.79:14.1_1: pajahati na upādiyati, pajahitvā ṭhito; neva visineti na ussineti, visinetvā ṭhito;
sn22.79:14.1_2: neva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti vidhūpetvā ṭhito
sn22.79:14.2: Kiñca nevācināti na apacināti, apacinitvā ṭhito?
sn22.79:14.3: Rūpaṁ nevācināti na apacināti, apacinitvā ṭhito;
sn22.79:14.7: viññāṇaṁ nevācināti na apacināti, apacinitvā ṭhito.
sn22.79:14.8: Kiñca neva pajahati na upādiyati, pajahitvā ṭhito?
sn22.79:14.9: Rūpaṁ neva pajahati na upādiyati, pajahitvā ṭhito;
sn22.79:14.13: viññāṇaṁ neva pajahati na upādiyati, pajahitvā ṭhito.
sn22.79:14.14: Kiñca neva visineti na ussineti, visinetvā ṭhito?
sn22.79:14.15: Rūpaṁ neva visineti na ussineti, visinetvā ṭhito;
sn22.79:14.19: viññāṇaṁ neva visineti na ussineti, visinetvā ṭhito.
sn22.79:14.20: Kiñca neva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti, vidhūpetvā ṭhito?
sn22.79:14.21: Rūpaṁ neva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti, vidhūpetvā ṭhito;
sn22.79:14.25: viññāṇaṁ neva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti, vidhūpetvā ṭhito.
sn22.79:14.26: Evaṁvimuttacittaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuṁ saindā devā sabrahmakā sapajāpatikā ārakāva namassanti:
sn22.80:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
sn22.80:1.2: Atha kho bhagavā kismiñcideva pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ paṇāmetvā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kapilavatthuṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
sn22.80:1.3: Kapilavatthusmiṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena mahāvanaṁ tenupasaṅkami divāvihārāya.
sn22.80:1.4: Mahāvanaṁ ajjhogāhetvā beluvalaṭṭhikāya mūle divāvihāraṁ nisīdi.
sn22.80:2.1: Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn22.80:2.3: Santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ.
sn22.80:2.4: Tesaṁ mamaṁ apassantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo.
sn22.80:2.5: Seyyathāpi nāma vacchassa taruṇassa mātaraṁ apassantassa siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo;
sn22.80:2.6: evameva santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ tesaṁ mamaṁ apassantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo.
sn22.80:2.7: Seyyathāpi nāma bījānaṁ taruṇānaṁ udakaṁ alabhantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo;
sn22.80:2.9: tesaṁ mamaṁ alabhantānaṁ dassanāya siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo.
sn22.80:2.10: Yannūnāhaṁ yatheva mayā pubbe bhikkhusaṅgho anuggahito, evameva etarahi anuggaṇheyyaṁ bhikkhusaṅghan”ti.
sn22.80:3.1_0: Atha kho brahmā sahampati bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya—seyyathāpi nāma
sn22.80:3.1_1: balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya pasāritaṁ vā bāhaṁ samiñjeyya; evameva—brahmaloke
sn22.80:3.2: Atha kho brahmā sahampati ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.80:3.5: Santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ.
sn22.80:3.6: Tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ apassantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo.
sn22.80:3.7: Seyyathāpi nāma vacchassa taruṇassa mātaraṁ apassantassa siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo;
sn22.80:3.8: evameva santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ apassantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo.
sn22.80:3.9: Seyyathāpi nāma bījānaṁ taruṇānaṁ udakaṁ alabhantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo;
sn22.80:3.10: evameva santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ, tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ alabhantānaṁ dassanāya siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo.
sn22.80:3.13: Yatheva bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhusaṅgho anuggahito, evameva etarahi anuggaṇhātu bhikkhusaṅghan”ti.
sn22.80:4.2: Atha kho brahmā sahampati bhagavato adhivāsanaṁ viditvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
sn22.80:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena nigrodhārāmo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
sn22.80:5.2: Nisajja kho bhagavā tathārūpaṁ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkhāsi yathā te bhikkhū ekadvīhikāya sārajjamānarūpā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkameyyuṁ.
sn22.80:5.3_0: Tepi bhikkhū ekadvīhikāya sārajjamānarūpā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā
sn22.80:5.3_1: bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinne kho te bhikkhū bhagavā etadavoca:
sn22.80:6.2: Abhisāpoyaṁ, bhikkhave, lokasmiṁ piṇḍolo vicarasi pattapāṇīti.
sn22.80:6.3: Tañca kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, kulaputtā upenti atthavasikā, atthavasaṁ paṭicca;
sn22.80:6.4: neva rājābhinītā, na corābhinītā, na iṇaṭṭā, na bhayaṭṭā, na ājīvikāpakatā;
sn22.80:6.5: api ca kho otiṇṇāmha jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇā dukkhaparetā
sn22.80:6.6: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethāti.
sn22.80:7.2: So ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo.
sn22.80:7.3: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, chavālātaṁ ubhatopadittaṁ majjhe gūthagataṁ, neva gāme kaṭṭhatthaṁ pharati, nāraññe kaṭṭhatthaṁ pharati.
sn22.80:7.4: Tathūpamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imaṁ puggalaṁ vadāmi gihibhogā ca parihīno, sāmaññatthañca na paripūreti.
sn22.80:8.3: Ime ca bhikkhave, tayo akusalavitakkā kva aparisesā nirujjhanti?
sn22.80:8.4: Catūsu vā satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittassa viharato animittaṁ vā samādhiṁ bhāvayato.
sn22.80:8.5: Yāvañcidaṁ, bhikkhave, alameva animitto samādhi bhāvetuṁ.
sn22.80:8.6: Animitto, bhikkhave, samādhi bhāvito bahulīkato mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṁso.
sn22.80:9.3: Tatra kho, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
sn22.80:9.4: ‘atthi nu kho taṁ kiñci lokasmiṁ yamahaṁ upādiyamāno na vajjavā assan’ti?
sn22.80:9.6: ‘natthi nu kho taṁ kiñci lokasmiṁ yamahaṁ upādiyamāno na vajjavā assaṁ.
sn22.80:10.4: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.80:10.6: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn22.81:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
sn22.81:1.2: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kosambiṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
sn22.81:1.3_0: Kosambiyaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto sāmaṁ senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā
sn22.81:1.3_1: pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ eko adutiyo cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
sn22.81:2.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu acirapakkantassa bhagavato yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.81:2.2: “esāvuso ānanda, bhagavā sāmaṁ senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ eko adutiyo cārikaṁ pakkanto”ti.
sn22.81:2.3_0: “Yasmiṁ, āvuso, samaye bhagavā sāmaṁ senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā
sn22.81:2.3_1: upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ eko adutiyo cārikaṁ pakkamati, ekova bhagavā
sn22.81:2.4: na bhagavā tasmiṁ samaye kenaci anubandhitabbo hotī”ti.
sn22.81:3.1: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena pālileyyakaṁ tadavasari.
sn22.81:3.2: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā pālileyyake viharati bhaddasālamūle.
sn22.81:3.3: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṁ sammodiṁsu.
sn22.81:3.4: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.81:3.5: “cirassutā kho no, āvuso ānanda, bhagavato sammukhā dhammī kathā;
sn22.81:3.6: icchāma mayaṁ, āvuso ānanda, bhagavato sammukhā dhammiṁ kathaṁ sotun”ti.
sn22.81:4.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando tehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ yena pālileyyakaṁ bhaddasālamūlaṁ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn22.81:4.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinne kho te bhikkhū bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
sn22.81:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn22.81:4.4: “kathaṁ nu kho jānato kathaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hotī”ti?
sn22.81:4.5: Atha kho bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn22.81:4.14: Evaṁ vicayaso desito, bhikkhave, mayā dhammo.
sn22.81:4.15: Evaṁ vicayaso desite kho, bhikkhave, mayā dhamme atha ca panidhekaccassa bhikkhuno evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn22.81:4.16: ‘kathaṁ nu kho jānato kathaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hotī’ti?
sn22.81:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, jānato kathaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti?
sn22.81:5.2: Idha bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto
sn22.81:5.4: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:5.5: So pana saṅkhāro kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
sn22.81:5.6: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:5.8: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:5.10: Sāpi vedanā, sopi phasso anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:5.12: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:6.1: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati;
sn22.81:6.2: api ca kho rūpavantaṁ attānaṁ samanupassati.
sn22.81:6.3: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:6.4: So pana saṅkhāro kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
sn22.81:6.5: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:6.7: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:6.12: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:7.1: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṁ attānaṁ samanupassati;
sn22.81:7.2: api ca kho attani rūpaṁ samanupassati.
sn22.81:7.3: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:7.4: So pana saṅkhāro kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
sn22.81:7.5: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:7.7: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:7.12: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:8.1: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṁ attānaṁ samanupassati, na attani rūpaṁ samanupassati;
sn22.81:8.2: api ca kho rūpasmiṁ attānaṁ samanupassati.
sn22.81:8.3: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:8.4: So pana saṅkhāro kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
sn22.81:8.5: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:8.7: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:8.12: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato …pe… āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:9.1: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṁ attānaṁ, na attani rūpaṁ, na rūpasmiṁ attānaṁ samanupassati;
sn22.81:9.2: api ca kho vedanaṁ attato samanupassati, api ca kho vedanāvantaṁ attānaṁ samanupassati, api ca kho attani vedanaṁ samanupassati, api ca kho vedanāya attānaṁ samanupassati;
sn22.81:9.4: api ca kho saṅkhāre attato samanupassati, api ca kho saṅkhāravantaṁ attānaṁ samanupassati, api ca kho attani saṅkhāre samanupassati, api ca kho saṅkhāresu attānaṁ samanupassati;
sn22.81:9.5: api ca kho viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, api ca kho viññāṇavantaṁ attānaṁ, api ca kho attani viññāṇaṁ, api ca kho viññāṇasmiṁ attānaṁ samanupassati.
sn22.81:9.6: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:9.8: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:9.10: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:9.15: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:10.1: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati,
sn22.81:10.7: ‘so attā so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’ti.
sn22.81:10.8: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, sassatadiṭṭhi saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:10.10: evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:11.1: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati,
sn22.81:11.7: ‘so attā so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’ti.
sn22.81:11.9: ‘no cassaṁ no ca me siyā nābhavissaṁ na me bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.81:11.10: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, ucchedadiṭṭhi saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:11.11: So pana saṅkhāro kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
sn22.81:11.12: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:11.14: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco …pe…
sn22.81:11.15: evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:12.1: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na vedanaṁ …
sn22.81:12.5: na viññāṇasmiṁ attato samanupassati, nāpi evaṁdiṭṭhi hoti:
sn22.81:12.6: ‘so attā so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’ti;
sn22.81:12.8: ‘no cassaṁ no ca me siyā nābhavissaṁ na me bhavissatī’ti;
sn22.81:12.9: api ca kho kaṅkhī hoti vicikicchī aniṭṭhaṅgato saddhamme.
sn22.81:12.10: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, kaṅkhitā vicikicchitā aniṭṭhaṅgatatā saddhamme saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:12.11: So pana saṅkhāro kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
sn22.81:12.12: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:12.14: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:12.19: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hotī”ti.
sn22.82:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ.
sn22.82:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe pannarase puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto ajjhokāse nisinno hoti.
sn22.82:2.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.82:2.2: “puccheyyāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavantaṁ kiñcideva desaṁ, sace me bhagavā okāsaṁ karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāyā”ti?
sn22.82:2.3: “Tena hi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, sake āsane nisīditvā puccha yadākaṅkhasī”ti.
sn22.82:2.4: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā sake āsane nisīditvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.82:3.3: “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṁ uttariṁ pañhaṁ apucchi:
sn22.82:4.3: taññeva nu kho, bhante, upādānaṁ te pañcupādānakkhandhā udāhu aññatra pañcahi upādānakkhandhehi upādānan”ti?
sn22.82:4.4: “Na kho, bhikkhu, taññeva upādānaṁ te pañcupādānakkhandhā nāpi aññatra pañcahi upādānakkhandhehi upādānaṁ, api ca yo tattha chandarāgo taṁ tattha upādānan”ti.
sn22.82:4.5: “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu …pe… uttariṁ pañhaṁ apucchi:
sn22.82:5.4: ‘evaṁrūpo siyaṁ anāgatamaddhānaṁ, evaṁvedano siyaṁ anāgatamaddhānaṁ, evaṁsañño siyaṁ anāgatamaddhānaṁ, evaṁsaṅkhāro siyaṁ anāgatamaddhānaṁ, evaṁviññāṇo siyaṁ anāgatamaddhānan’ti.
sn22.82:5.5: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, siyā pañcupādānakkhandhesu chandarāgavemattatā”ti?
sn22.82:5.6: “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu …pe… uttariṁ pañhaṁ apucchi:
sn22.82:6.2: “Yaṁ kiñci, bhikkhu, rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā, ayaṁ vuccati rūpakkhandho.
sn22.82:6.6: yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā, ayaṁ vuccati viññāṇakkhandho.
sn22.82:7.1: “Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo rūpakkhandhassa paññāpanāya;
sn22.82:7.2: ko hetu ko paccayo vedanākkhandhassa paññāpanāya;
sn22.82:7.3: ko hetu ko paccayo saññākkhandhassa paññāpanāya;
sn22.82:7.4: ko hetu ko paccayo saṅkhārakkhandhassa paññāpanāya;
sn22.82:7.5: ko hetu ko paccayo viññāṇakkhandhassa paññāpanāyā”ti?
sn22.82:7.6: “Cattāro kho, bhikkhu, mahābhūtā hetu, cattāro mahābhūtā paccayo rūpakkhandhassa paññāpanāya.
sn22.82:7.7: Phasso hetu phasso paccayo vedanākkhandhassa paññāpanāya.
sn22.82:7.8: Phasso hetu phasso paccayo saññākkhandhassa paññāpanāya.
sn22.82:7.9: Phasso hetu, phasso paccayo saṅkhārakkhandhassa paññāpanāya.
sn22.82:7.10: Nāmarūpaṁ hetu, nāmarūpaṁ paccayo viññāṇakkhandhassa paññāpanāyā”ti.
sn22.82:8.2: “Idha, bhikkhu, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto
sn22.82:8.3: rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ;
sn22.82:8.7: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.82:9.2: “Idha, bhikkhu, sutavā ariyasāvako ariyānaṁ dassāvī ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto, sappurisānaṁ dassāvī sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinīto
sn22.82:9.3: na rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; na attani vā rūpaṁ, na rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ;
sn22.82:9.7: na viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, na viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; na attani vā viññāṇaṁ, na viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.82:9.8: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, sakkāyadiṭṭhi na hotī”ti.
sn22.82:10.1: “Ko nu kho, bhante, rūpassa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ;
sn22.82:10.5: ko viññāṇassa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇan”ti?
sn22.82:10.6: “Yaṁ kho, bhikkhu, rūpaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ—ayaṁ rūpassa assādo.
sn22.82:10.7: Yaṁ rūpaṁ aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ—ayaṁ rūpassa ādīnavo.
sn22.82:10.8: Yo rūpasmiṁ chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ—idaṁ rūpassa nissaraṇaṁ.
sn22.82:10.12: yaṁ viññāṇaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ—ayaṁ viññāṇassa assādo.
sn22.82:10.13: Yaṁ viññāṇaṁ aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ—ayaṁ viññāṇassa ādīnavo.
sn22.82:10.14: Yo viññāṇasmiṁ chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ—idaṁ viññāṇassa nissaraṇan”ti.
sn22.82:10.15: “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṁ uttariṁ pañhaṁ apucchi:
sn22.82:11.1: “Kathaṁ nu kho, bhante, jānato, kathaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na hontī”ti?
sn22.82:11.2_0: “Yaṁ kiñci, bhikkhu, rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ
sn22.82:11.2_1: vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā, sabbaṁ rūpaṁ: ‘netaṁ mama,
sn22.82:11.2_2: nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
sn22.82:11.6_0: yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ
sn22.82:11.6_1: vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā, sabbaṁ viññāṇaṁ: ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi,
sn22.82:11.6_2: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
sn22.82:11.7: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, jānato evaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na hontī”ti.
sn22.82:12.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn22.82:12.2: “iti kira bho rūpaṁ anattā, vedanā … saññā … saṅkhārā … viññāṇaṁ anattā;
sn22.82:12.4: Atha kho bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno cetasā ceto parivitakkamaññāya bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn22.82:13.1: “Ṭhānaṁ kho panetaṁ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṁ idhekacco moghapuriso avidvā avijjāgato taṇhādhipateyyena cetasā satthusāsanaṁ atidhāvitabbaṁ maññeyya.
sn22.82:13.2: ‘Iti kira, bho, rūpaṁ anattā, vedanā … saññā … saṅkhārā … viññāṇaṁ anattā.
sn22.82:13.4: Paṭipucchāvinītā kho me tumhe, bhikkhave, tatra tatra tesu tesu dhammesu.
sn22.82:14.9: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.82:14.11: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn22.83:1.2: Tatra kho āyasmā ānando bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn22.83:1.4: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato ānandassa paccassosuṁ.
sn22.83:2.1: “Puṇṇo nāma, āvuso, āyasmā mantāṇiputto amhākaṁ navakānaṁ sataṁ bahūpakāro hoti.
sn22.83:2.3: ‘upādāya, āvuso ānanda, asmīti hoti, no anupādāya.
sn22.83:2.4: Kiñca upādāya asmīti hoti, no anupādāya?
sn22.83:2.5: Rūpaṁ upādāya asmīti hoti, no anupādāya.
sn22.83:2.9: viññāṇaṁ upādāya asmīti hoti, no anupādāya.
sn22.83:3.1_0: Seyyathāpi, āvuso ānanda, itthī vā puriso vā daharo yuvā maṇḍanakajātiko ādāse vā
sn22.83:3.1_1: parisuddhe pariyodāte acche vā udakapatte sakaṁ mukhanimittaṁ paccavekkhamāno upādāya
sn22.83:3.2: evameva kho, āvuso ānanda, rūpaṁ upādāya asmīti hoti, no anupādāya.
sn22.83:3.6: viññāṇaṁ upādāya asmīti hoti, no anupādāya.
sn22.83:4.12: Puṇṇo nāma, āvuso, āyasmā mantāṇiputto amhākaṁ navakānaṁ sataṁ bahūpakāro hoti.
sn22.83:4.14: Idañca pana me āyasmato puṇṇassa mantāṇiputtassa dhammadesanaṁ sutvā dhammo abhisamito”ti.
sn22.84:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā tisso bhagavato pitucchāputto sambahulānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ evamāroceti:
sn22.84:1.3_0: “api me, āvuso, madhurakajāto viya kāyo; disāpi me na pakkhāyanti; dhammāpi maṁ na
sn22.84:1.3_1: paṭibhanti; thinamiddhañca me cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati; anabhirato ca brahmacariyaṁ
sn22.84:1.3_2: carāmi; hoti ca me dhammesu vicikicchā”ti.
sn22.84:2.1: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.84:2.2: “āyasmā, bhante, tisso bhagavato pitucchāputto sambahulānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ evamāroceti:
sn22.84:2.3_0: ‘api me, āvuso, madhurakajāto viya kāyo; disāpi me na pakkhāyanti; dhammāpi maṁ na
sn22.84:2.3_1: paṭibhanti; thinamiddhañca me cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati; anabhirato ca brahmacariyaṁ
sn22.84:2.3_2: carāmi; hoti ca me dhammesu vicikicchā’”ti.
sn22.84:3.1: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantesi:
sn22.84:3.2: “ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena tissaṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantehī”ti.
sn22.84:3.3: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yenāyasmā tisso tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ tissaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.84:3.5_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā tisso tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.84:3.5_1: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ
sn22.84:3.6: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, tissa, sambahulānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ evamārocesi:
sn22.84:3.7: ‘api me, āvuso, madhurakajāto viya kāyo …pe… hoti ca me dhammesu vicikicchā’”ti?
sn22.84:3.10_0: rūpe avigatarāgassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipāsassa avigatapariḷāhassa
sn22.84:3.10_1: avigatataṇhassa, tassa rūpassa vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
sn22.84:5.3_0: Yathā taṁ saṅkhāresu anigatarāgassa, viññāṇe avigatarāgassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa
sn22.84:5.3_1: avigatapipāsassa avigatapariḷāhassa avigatataṇhassa, tassa viññāṇassa vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā
sn22.84:6.5_0: rūpe vigatarāgassa vigatacchandassa vigatapemassa vigatapipāsassa vigatapariḷāhassa
sn22.84:6.5_1: vigatataṇhassa, tassa rūpassa vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
sn22.84:7.7_0: viññāṇe vigatarāgassa vigatacchandassa vigatapemassa vigatapipāsassa vigatapariḷāhassa
sn22.84:7.7_1: vigatataṇhassa tassa viññāṇassa vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
sn22.84:9.2: eko puriso amaggakusalo, eko puriso maggakusalo.
sn22.84:9.3: Tamenaṁ so amaggakusalo puriso amuṁ maggakusalaṁ purisaṁ maggaṁ puccheyya.
sn22.84:9.7: Tena muhuttaṁ gantvā dakkhissasi dvedhāpathaṁ, tattha vāmaṁ muñcitvā dakkhiṇaṁ gaṇhāhi.
sn22.84:9.9: Tena muhuttaṁ gantvā dakkhissasi tibbaṁ vanasaṇḍaṁ.
sn22.84:9.11: Tena muhuttaṁ gantvā dakkhissasi mahantaṁ ninnaṁ pallalaṁ.
sn22.84:9.13: Tena muhuttaṁ gantvā dakkhissasi sobbhaṁ papātaṁ.
sn22.84:9.15: Tena muhuttaṁ gantvā dakkhissasi samaṁ bhūmibhāgaṁ ramaṇīyan’ti.
sn22.84:10.1: Upamā kho myāyaṁ, tissa, katā atthassa viññāpanāya.
sn22.84:10.4: ‘Puriso maggakusalo’ti kho, tissa, tathāgatassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
sn22.84:10.6: ‘Vāmo maggo’ti kho, tissa, aṭṭhaṅgikassetaṁ micchāmaggassa adhivacanaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.84:10.8: ‘Dakkhiṇo maggo’ti kho, tissa, ariyassetaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa adhivacanaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.84:10.11: ‘Mahantaṁ ninnaṁ pallalan’ti kho, tissa, kāmānametaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
sn22.84:10.13: ‘Samo bhūmibhāgo ramaṇīyo’ti kho, tissa, nibbānassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
sn22.84:11.2: Attamano āyasmā tisso bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
sn22.85:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā sāriputto sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn22.85:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena yamakassa nāma bhikkhuno evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ hoti:
sn22.85:1.3: “tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi, yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṁ maraṇā”ti.
sn22.85:2.1: Assosuṁ kho sambahulā bhikkhū yamakassa kira nāma bhikkhuno evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ hoti:
sn22.85:2.2: “tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi, yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṁ maraṇā”ti.
sn22.85:2.3: Atha kho te bhikkhū yenāyasmā yamako tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā yamakena saddhiṁ sammodiṁsu.
sn22.85:2.4: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ yamakaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.85:3.1: “Saccaṁ kira te, āvuso yamaka, evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ:
sn22.85:3.2: ‘tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi, yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṁ maraṇā’”ti?
sn22.85:3.3: “Evaṁ khvāhaṁ, āvuso, bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi:
sn22.85:3.4: ‘khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṁ maraṇā’”ti.
sn22.85:4.1: “Mā, āvuso yamaka, evaṁ avaca, mā bhagavantaṁ abbhācikkhi. Na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhācikkhanaṁ. Na hi bhagavā evaṁ vadeyya:
sn22.85:4.2: ‘khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṁ maraṇā’”ti.
sn22.85:4.3: Evampi kho āyasmā yamako tehi bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva taṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ thāmasā parāmāsā abhinivissa voharati:
sn22.85:4.4: “tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi, yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṁ maraṇā”ti.
sn22.85:5.1_0: Yato kho te bhikkhū nāsakkhiṁsu āyasmantaṁ yamakaṁ etasmā pāpakā diṭṭhigatā vivecetuṁ,
sn22.85:5.1_1: atha kho te bhikkhū uṭṭhāyāsanā yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā
sn22.85:5.2: “yamakassa nāma, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhuno evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ:
sn22.85:5.3: ‘tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṁ maraṇā’ti.
sn22.85:5.4: Sādhāyasmā sāriputto yena yamako bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā”ti.
sn22.85:5.6_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā yamako tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.85:5.6_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā yamakena saddhiṁ sammodi …pe… ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā
sn22.85:6.1: “Saccaṁ kira te, āvuso yamaka, evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ:
sn22.85:6.2: ‘tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi, yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṁ maraṇā’”ti?
sn22.85:6.3: “Evaṁ khvāhaṁ, āvuso, bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi, yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṁ maraṇā”ti.
sn22.85:10.2: rūpaṁ … vedanaṁ … saññaṁ … saṅkhāre … viññāṇaṁ tathāgatoti samanupassasī”ti?
sn22.85:11.2: ayaṁ so arūpī … avedano … asaññī … asaṅkhāro … aviññāṇo tathāgatoti samanupassasī”ti?
sn22.85:11.4: “Ettha ca te, āvuso yamaka, diṭṭheva dhamme saccato thetato tathāgate anupalabbhiyamāne, kallaṁ nu te taṁ veyyākaraṇaṁ:
sn22.85:11.5: ‘tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi, yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṁ maraṇā’”ti?
sn22.85:12.1: “Ahu kho me taṁ, āvuso sāriputta, pubbe aviddasuno pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ;
sn22.85:12.2: idañca panāyasmato sāriputtassa dhammadesanaṁ sutvā tañceva pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ pahīnaṁ, dhammo ca me abhisamito”ti.
sn22.85:13.2: ‘yo so, āvuso yamaka, bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo so kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā kiṁ hotī’ti?
sn22.85:13.3: Evaṁ puṭṭho tvaṁ, āvuso yamaka, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn22.85:13.5: ‘yo so, āvuso yamaka, bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo so kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā kiṁ hotī’ti?
sn22.85:14.2: Tena hāvuso yamaka, upamaṁ te karissāmi etasseva atthassa bhiyyoso mattāya ñāṇāya.
sn22.85:14.3: Seyyathāpi, āvuso yamaka, gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo;
sn22.85:14.5: Tassa kocideva puriso uppajjeyya anatthakāmo ahitakāmo ayogakkhemakāmo jīvitā voropetukāmo.
sn22.85:14.7: ‘ayaṁ kho gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo;
